77812 Hash

78606 Hash
79003 table
79400 Type
79797 Unordered
80194 associative
80591 array
80988 Invented
81385 1953
81782 A
82179 small
82576 phone
82973 book
83370 as
83767 a
84164 hash
84561 table
84958 In
85355 computing
85752 a
86149 hash
86546 table
86943 hash
87340 map
87737 is
88134 a
88531 data
88928 structure
89325 used
89722 to
90119 implement
90516 an
90913 associative
91310 array

92104 structure
92501 that
92898 can
93295 map
93692 keys
94089 to
94486 values
94883 A
95280 hash
95677 table
96074 uses
96471 a
96868 hash
97265 function
97662 to
98059 compute
98456 an
98853 index
99250 into
99647 an
100044 array
100441 of
100838 buckets

101632 slots
102029 from
102426 which
102823 the
103220 correct
103617 value
104014 can
104411 be
104808 found
105205 Ideally
105602 the
105999 hash
106396 function
106793 will
107190 assign
107587 each
107984 key
108381 to
108778 a
109175 unique
109572 bucket
109969 but
110366 this
110763 situation
111160 is
111557 rarely
111954 achievable
112351 in
112748 practice
113145 usually
113542 some
113939 keys
114336 will
114733 hash
115130 to
115527 the
115924 same
116321 bucket
116718 Instead
117115 most
117512 hash

238303 assume
239100 that
239897 hash
240694 collisions
241491 different
242288 keys
243085 that
243882 are
244679 assigned
245476 by
246273 the
247070 hash
247867 function

249461 the
250258 same

252649 occur

254243 must
255040 be
255837 accommodated
256634 in
257431 some
258228 way

259822 a
260619 well

262213 hash
263010 table

264604 average
265401 cost
266198 number
266995 of
267792 instructions

269386 each

271777 independent

283732 allow
284529 arbitrary
285326 insertions
286123 and
286920 deletions

288514 key
289311 value

290905 at
291702 amortized2
292499 constant
293296 average
294093 cost
294890 per
295687 operation34

297281 many

301266 out

302860 be
303657 more
304454 efficient

306845 trees

313221 this
314018 reason

315612 are

321988 software

323582 for
324379 associative

325973 database
326770 indexing
327567 caches
328364 and
329161 sets
329958 Hash
330755 function
331552 The
332349 idea
333146 of
333943 hashing
334740 is
335537 to
336334 distribute
337131 the
337928 entries
338725 key
339522 value
340319 pairs
341116 across
341913 an
342710 array
343507 of
344304 buckets
345101 Given
345898 a
346695 key
347492 the
348289 algorithm
349086 computes
349883 an
350680 index
351477 that
352274 suggests
353071 where
353868 the
354665 entry
355462 can
356259 be
357056 found

358650 fkey
359447 array
360244 size
361041 Often

362635 is
363432 done

365823 steps

368214 index
369011 hash
369808 array

387342 number

415237 increase

424004 function

428786 implementation

439147 to
439944 achieve

468636 ensure

4554666 a
4557869 universal
4561072 hash
4564275 function
4567478 Perfect
4570681 hash
4573884 function
4577087 If
4580290 all
4583493 keys
4586696 are
4589899 known
4593102 ahead
4596305 of
4599508 time
4602711 a
4605914 perfect
4609117 hash
4612320 function
4615523 can
4618726 be
4621929 used
4625132 to
4628335 create
4631538 a
4634741 perfect
4637944 hash
4641147 table
4644350 that
4647553 has
4650756 no
4653959 collisions
4657162 If
4660365 minimal
4663568 perfect
4666771 hashing
4669974 is
4673177 used
4676380 every
4679583 location
4682786 in
4685989 the
4689192 hash
4692395 table
4695598 can
4698801 be
4702004 used
4705207 as
4708410 well
4711613 Perfect
4714816 hashing
4718019 allows
4721222 for
4724425 constant
4727628 time
4730831 lookups
4734034 in
4737237 the
4740440 worst
4743643 case
4746846 This
4750049 is
4753252 in
4756455 contrast
4759658 to
4762861 most
4766064 chaining
4769267 and
4772470 open
4775673 addressing
4778876 methods
4782079 where
4785282 the
4788485 time
4791688 for
4794891 lookup
4798094 is
4801297 low
4804500 on
4807703 average
4810906 but
4814109 may
4817312 be
4820515 very
4823718 large
4826921 proportional
4830124 to
4833327 the
4836530 number
4839733 of
4842936 entries
4846139 for
4849342 some
4852545 sets
4855748 of
4858951 keys
4862154 Key
4865357 statistics
4868560 A
4871763 critical
4874966 statistic
4878169 for
4881372 a
4884575 hash
4887778 table
4890981 is
4894184 called
4897387 the
4900590 load
4903793 factor
4906996 This
4910199 is
4913402 simply
4916605 the
4919808 number
4923011 of
4926214 entries
4929417 divided
4932620 by
4935823 the
4939026 number
4942229 of
4945432 buckets
4948635 that
4951838 is
4955041 n
4958244 k
4961447 where
4964650 n
4967853 is
4971056 the
4974259 number
4977462 of
4980665 entries
4983868 and
4987071 k
4990274 is
4993477 the
4996680 number
4999883 of
5003086 buckets
5006289 If
5009492 the
5012695 load
5015898 factor
5019101 is
5022304 kept
5025507 reasonable
5028710 the
5031913 hash
5035116 table
5038319 should
5041522 perform
5044725 well
5047928 provided
5051131 the
5054334 hashing
5057537 is
5060740 good
5063943 If
5067146 the
5070349 load
5073552 factor
5076755 grows
5079958 too
5083161 large
5086364 the
5089567 hash
5092770 table
5095973 will
5099176 become
5102379 slow
5105582 or
5108785 it
5111988 may
5115191 fail
5118394 to
5121597 work
5124800 depending
5128003 on
5131206 the
5134409 method
5137612 used
5140815 The
5144018 expected
5147221 constant
5150424 time
5153627 property
5156830 of
5160033 a
5163236 hash
5166439 table
5169642 assumes
5172845 that
5176048 the
5179251 load
5182454 factor
5185657 is
5188860 kept
5192063 below
5195266 some
5198469 bound
5201672 For
5204875 a
5208078 fixed
5211281 number
5214484 of
5217687 buckets
5220890 the
5224093 time
5227296 for
5230499 a
5233702 lookup
5236905 grows
5240108 with
5243311 the
5246514 number
5249717 of
5252920 entries
5256123 and
5259326 so
5262529 does
5265732 not
5268935 achieve
5272138 the
5275341 desired
5278544 constant
5281747 time
5284950 Second
5288153 to
5291356 that
5294559 one
5297762 can
5300965 examine
5304168 the
5307371 variance
5310574 of
5313777 number
5316980 of
5320183 entries
5323386 per
5326589 bucket
5329792 For
5332995 example
5336198 two
5339401 tables
5342604 both
5345807 have
5349010 1000
5352213 entries
5355416 and
5358619 1000
5361822 buckets
5365025 one
5368228 has
5371431 exactly
5374634 one
5377837 entry
5381040 in
5384243 each
5387446 bucket
5390649 the
5393852 other
5397055 has
5400258 all
5403461 entries
5406664 in
5409867 the
5413070 same
5416273 bucket
5419476 Clearly
5422679 the
5425882 hashing
5429085 is
5432288 not
5435491 working
5438694 in
5441897 the
5445100 second
5448303 one
5451506 A
5454709 low
5457912 load
5461115 factor
5464318 is
5467521 not
5470724 especially
5473927 beneficial
5477130 As
5480333 the
5483536 load
5486739 factor
5489942 approaches
5493145 0
5496348 the
5499551 proportion
5502754 of
5505957 unused
5509160 areas
5512363 in
5515566 the
5518769 hash
5521972 table
5525175 increases
5528378 but
5531581 there
5534784 is
5537987 not
5541190 necessarily
5544393 any
5547596 reduction
5550799 in
5554002 search
5557205 cost
5560408 This
5563611 results
5566814 in
5570017 wasted
5573220 memory
5576423 Collision
5579626 resolution
5582829 Hash
5586032 collisions
5589235 are
5592438 practically
5595641 unavoidable
5598844 when
5602047 hashing
5605250 a
5608453 random
5611656 subset
5614859 of
5618062 a
5621265 large
5624468 set
5627671 of
5630874 possible
5634077 keys
5637280 For
5640483 example
5643686 if
5646889 2
5650092 450
5653295 keys
5656498 are
5659701 hashed
5662904 into
5666107 a
5669310 million
5672513 buckets
5675716 even
5678919 with
5682122 a
5685325 perfectly
5688528 uniform
5691731 random
5694934 distribution
5698137 according
5701340 to
5704543 the
5707746 birthday
5710949 problem
5714152 there
5717355 is
5720558 approximately
5723761 a
5726964 95
5730167 chance
5733370 of
5736573 at
5739776 least
5742979 two
5746182 of
5749385 the
5752588 keys
5755791 being
5758994 hashed
5762197 to
5765400 the
5768603 same
5771806 slot
5775009 Therefore
5778212 most
5781415 hash
5784618 table
5787821 implementations
5791024 have
5794227 some
5797430 collision
5800633 resolution
5803836 strategy
5807039 to
5810242 handle
5813445 such
5816648 events
5819851 Some
5823054 common
5826257 strategies
5829460 are
5832663 described
5835866 below
5839069 All
5842272 these
5845475 methods
5848678 require
5851881 that
5855084 the
5858287 keys
5861490 or
5864693 pointers
5867896 to
5871099 them
5874302 be
5877505 stored
5880708 in
5883911 the
5887114 table
5890317 together
5893520 with
5896723 the
5899926 associated
5903129 values
5906332 Separate
5909535 chaining
5912738 Hash
5915941 collision
5919144 resolved
5922347 by
5925550 separate
5928753 chaining
5931956 In
5935159 the
5938362 method
5941565 known
5944768 as
5947971 separate
5951174 chaining
5954377 each
5957580 bucket
5960783 is
5963986 independent
5967189 and
5970392 has
5973595 some
5976798 sort
5980001 of
5983204 list
5986407 of
5989610 entries
5992813 with
5996016 the
5999219 same
6002422 index
6005625 The
6008828 time
6012031 for
6015234 hash
6018437 table
6021640 operations
6024843 is
6028046 the
6031249 time
6034452 to
6037655 find
6040858 the
6044061 bucket
6047264 which
6050467 is
6053670 constant
6056873 plus
6060076 the
6063279 time
6066482 for
6069685 the
6072888 list
6076091 operation
6079294 The
6082497 technique
6085700 is
6088903 also
6092106 called
6095309 open
6098512 hashing
6101715 or
6104918 closed
6108121 addressing
6111324 In
6114527 a
6117730 good
6120933 hash
6124136 table
6127339 each
6130542 bucket
6133745 has
6136948 zero
6140151 or
6143354 one
6146557 entries
6149760 and
6152963 sometimes
6156166 two
6159369 or
6162572 three
6165775 but
6168978 rarely
6172181 more
6175384 than
6178587 that
6181790 Therefore
6184993 structures
6188196 that
6191399 are
6194602 efficient
6197805 in
6201008 time
6204211 and
6207414 space
6210617 for
6213820 these
6217023 cases
6220226 are
6223429 preferred
6226632 Structures
6229835 that
6233038 are
6236241 efficient
6239444 for
6242647 a
6245850 fairly
6249053 large
6252256 number
6255459 of
6258662 entries
6261865 per
6265068 bucket
6268271 are
6271474 not
6274677 needed
6277880 or
6281083 desirable
6284286 If
6287489 these
6290692 cases
6293895 happen
6297098 often
6300301 the
6303504 hashing
6306707 is
6309910 not
6313113 working
6316316 well
6319519 and
6322722 this
6325925 needs
6329128 to
6332331 be
6335534 fixed
6338737 Separate
6341940 chaining
6345143 with
6348346 linked
6351549 lists
6354752 Chained
6357955 hash
6361158 tables
6364361 with
6367564 linked
6370767 lists
6373970 are
6377173 popular
6380376 because
6383579 they
6386782 require
6389985 only
6393188 basic
6396391 data
6399594 structures
6402797 with
6406000 simple
6409203 algorithms
6412406 and
6415609 can
6418812 use
6422015 simple
6425218 hash
6428421 functions
6431624 that
6434827 are
6438030 unsuitable
6441233 for
6444436 other
6447639 methods
6450842 The
6454045 cost
6457248 of
6460451 a
6463654 table
6466857 operation
6470060 is
6473263 that
6476466 of
6479669 scanning
6482872 the
6486075 entries
6489278 of
6492481 the
6495684 selected
6498887 bucket
6502090 for
6505293 the
6508496 desired
6511699 key
6514902 If
6518105 the
6521308 distribution
6524511 of
6527714 keys
6530917 is
6534120 sufficiently
6537323 uniform
6540526 the
6543729 average
6546932 cost
6550135 of
6553338 a
6556541 lookup
6559744 depends
6562947 only
6566150 on
6569353 the
6572556 average
6575759 number
6578962 of
6582165 keys
6585368 per
6588571 bucket
6591774 that
6594977 is
6598180 on
6601383 the
6604586 load
6607789 factor
6610992 Chained
6614195 hash
6617398 tables
6620601 remain
6623804 effective
6627007 even
6630210 when
6633413 the
6636616 number
6639819 of
6643022 table
6646225 entries
6649428 n
6652631 is
6655834 much
6659037 higher
6662240 than
6665443 the
6668646 number
6671849 of
6675052 slots
6678255 Their
6681458 performance
6684661 degrades
6687864 more
6691067 gracefully
6694270 linearly
6697473 with
6700676 the
6703879 load
6707082 factor
6710285 For
6713488 example
6716691 a
6719894 chained
6723097 hash
6726300 table
6729503 with
6732706 1000
6735909 slots
6739112 and
6742315 10
6745518 000
6748721 stored
6751924 keys
6755127 load
6758330 factor
6761533 10
6764736 is
6767939 five
6771142 to
6774345 ten
6777548 times
6780751 slower
6783954 than
6787157 a
6790360 10
6793563 000
6796766 slot
6799969 table
6803172 load
6806375 factor
6809578 1
6812781 but
6815984 still
6819187 1000
6822390 times
6825593 faster
6828796 than
6831999 a
6835202 plain
6838405 sequential
6841608 list
6844811 and
6848014 possibly
6851217 even
6854420 faster
6857623 than
6860826 a
6864029 balanced
6867232 search
6870435 tree
6873638 For
6876841 separate
6880044 chaining
6883247 the
6886450 worst
6889653 case
6892856 scenario
6896059 is

6902465 all
6905668 entries
6908871 are
6912074 inserted
6915277 into
6918480 the
6921683 same
6924886 bucket
6928089 in

6934495 case
6937698 the
6940901 hash
6944104 table

6950510 ineffective
6953713 and
6956916 the
6960119 cost
6963322 is
6966525 that
6969728 of
6972931 searching
6976134 the
6979337 bucket
6982540 data
6985743 structure
6988946 If
6992149 the
6995352 latter
6998555 is
7001758 a
7004961 linear
7008164 list
7011367 the
7014570 lookup
7017773 procedure
7020976 may
7024179 have
7027382 to
7030585 scan
7033788 all
7036991 its
7040194 entries
7043397 so
7046600 the
7049803 worst
7053006 case
7056209 cost
7059412 is
7062615 proportional
7065818 to
7069021 the
7072224 number
7075427 n
7078630 of
7081833 entries
7085036 in
7088239 the
7091442 table
7094645 The
7097848 bucket

7104254 are
7107457 often
7110660 implemented
7113863 as
7117066 ordered
7120269 lists
7123472 sorted
7126675 by
7129878 the
7133081 key
7136284 field
7139487 this
7142690 choice
7145893 approximately
7149096 halves
7152299 the
7155502 average
7158705 cost

7165111 unsuccessful
7168314 lookups
7171517 compared
7174720 to
7177923 an
7181126 unordered
7184329 list

7190735 if
7193938 some
7197141 keys
7200344 are
7203547 much

7209953 likely
7213156 to
7216359 come
7219562 up
7222765 than
7225968 others
7229171 an
7232374 unordered
7235577 list
7238780 with
7241983 move
7245186 to
7248389 front
7251592 heuristic
7254795 may
7257998 be
7261201 more
7264404 effective
7267607 More
7270810 sophisticated
7274013 data

7280419 such
7283622 as

7299637 worth

7306043 only

7312449 the
7315652 load
7318855 factor
7322058 is

7331667 10
7334870 or

7347682 the

7354088 distribution
7357291 is
7360494 likely
7363697 to
7366900 be
7370103 very
7373306 non

7389321 must
7392524 guarantee
7395727 good

7414945 case

7424554 using

7437366 and
7440569 or

7446975 better

7456584 may
7459787 be
7462990 even
7466193 more
7469396 effective
7472599 in
7475802 those
7479005 cases

7485411 hash
7488614 tables
7491817 also
7495020 inherit
7498223 the
7501426 disadvantages
7504629 of
7507832 linked
7511035 lists
7514238 When
7517441 storing
7520644 small
7523847 keys
7527050 and
7530253 values
7533456 the
7536659 space
7539862 overhead
7543065 of
7546268 the
7549471 next
7552674 pointer
7555877 in
7559080 each
7562283 entry
7565486 record
7568689 can
7571892 be
7575095 significant
7578298 An
7581501 additional
7584704 disadvantage
7587907 is
7591110 that
7594313 traversing

7600719 linked
7603922 list
7607125 has
7610328 poor
7613531 cache
7616734 performance
7619937 making
7623140 the
7626343 processor
7629546 cache
7632749 ineffective
7635952 Separate
7639155 chaining
7642358 with
7645561 list
7648764 head
7651967 cells
7655170 Hash
7658373 collision
7661576 by
7664779 separate
7667982 chaining
7671185 with
7674388 head
7677591 records
7680794 in
7683997 the
7687200 bucket
7690403 array
7693606 Some
7696809 chaining
15436084 implementations
15442505 store
15448926 the
15455347 first
15461768 record
15468189 of
15474610 each
15481031 chain
15487452 in
15493873 the
15500294 slot
15506715 array
15513136 itself4
15519557 The
15525978 number
15532399 of
15538820 pointer
15545241 traversals
15551662 is
15558083 decreased
15564504 by
15570925 one
15577346 for
15583767 most
15590188 cases
15596609 The
15603030 purpose
15609451 is
15615872 to
15622293 increase
15628714 cache
15635135 efficiency
15641556 of
15647977 hash
15654398 table
15660819 access
15667240 The
15673661 disadvantage
15680082 is
15686503 that
15692924 an
15699345 empty
15705766 bucket
15712187 takes
15718608 the
15725029 same
15731450 space
15737871 as
15744292 a
15750713 bucket
15757134 with
15763555 one
15769976 entry
15776397 To
15782818 save
15789239 space
15795660 such
15802081 hash
15808502 tables
15814923 often
15821344 have
15827765 about
15834186 as
15840607 many
15847028 slots
15853449 as
15859870 stored
15866291 entries
15872712 meaning
15879133 that
15885554 many
15891975 slots
15898396 have
15904817 two
15911238 or
15917659 more
15924080 entries
15930501 Separate
15936922 chaining
15943343 with
15949764 other
15956185 structures
15962606 Instead
15969027 of
15975448 a
15981869 list
15988290 one
15994711 can
16001132 use
16007553 any
16013974 other
16020395 data
16026816 structure
16033237 that
16039658 supports
16046079 the
16052500 required
16058921 operations
16065342 For
16071763 example
16078184 by
16084605 using
16091026 a
16097447 self
16103868 balancing
16110289 tree
16116710 the
16123131 theoretical
16129552 worst
16135973 case
16142394 time
16148815 of
16155236 common
16161657 hash
16168078 table
16174499 operations
16180920 insertion
16187341 deletion
16193762 lookup
16200183 can
16206604 be
16213025 brought
16219446 down
16225867 to
16232288 Olog
16238709 n
16245130 rather
16251551 than
16257972 On
16264393 However
16270814 this
16277235 approach
16283656 is
16290077 only
16296498 worth
16302919 the
16309340 trouble
16315761 and
16322182 extra
16328603 memory
16335024 cost
16341445 if
16347866 long
16354287 delays
16360708 must
16367129 be
16373550 avoided
16379971 at
16386392 all
16392813 costs
16399234 eg
16405655 in
16412076 a
16418497 real
16424918 time
16431339 application
16437760 or
16444181 if
16450602 one
16457023 must
16463444 guard
16469865 against
16476286 many
16482707 entries
16489128 hashed
16495549 to
16501970 the
16508391 same
16514812 slot
16521233 eg
16527654 if
16534075 one
16540496 expects
16546917 extremely
16553338 non
16559759 uniform
16566180 distributions
16572601 or
16579022 in
16585443 the
16591864 case
16598285 of
16604706 web
16611127 sites
16617548 or
16623969 other
16630390 publicly
16636811 accessible
16643232 services
16649653 which
16656074 are
16662495 vulnerable
16668916 to
16675337 malicious
16681758 key
16688179 distributions
16694600 in
16701021 requests
16707442 The
16713863 variant
16720284 called
16726705 array
16733126 hash
16739547 table
16745968 uses
16752389 a
16758810 dynamic
16765231 array
16771652 to
16778073 store
16784494 all
16790915 the
16797336 entries
16803757 that
16810178 hash
16816599 to
16823020 the
16829441 same
16835862 slot8910
16842283 Each
16848704 newly
16855125 inserted
16861546 entry
16867967 gets
16874388 appended
16880809 to
16887230 the
16893651 end
16900072 of
16906493 the
16912914 dynamic
16919335 array
16925756 that
16932177 is
16938598 assigned
16945019 to
16951440 the
16957861 slot
16964282 The
16970703 dynamic
16977124 array
16983545 is
16989966 resized
16996387 in
17002808 an
17009229 exact
17015650 fit
17022071 manner
17028492 meaning
17034913 it
17041334 is
17047755 grown
17054176 only
17060597 by
17067018 as
17073439 many
17079860 bytes
17086281 as
17092702 needed
17099123 Alternative
17105544 techniques
17111965 such
17118386 as
17124807 growing
17131228 the
17137649 array
17144070 by
17150491 block
17156912 sizes
17163333 or
17169754 pages
17176175 were
17182596 found
17189017 to
17195438 improve
17201859 insertion
17208280 performance
17214701 but
17221122 at
17227543 a
17233964 cost
17240385 in
17246806 space
17253227 This
17259648 variation
17266069 makes
17272490 more
17278911 efficient
17285332 use
17291753 of
17298174 CPU
17304595 caching
17311016 and
17317437 the
17323858 translation
17330279 lookaside
17336700 buffer
17343121 TLB
17349542 because
17355963 slot
17362384 entries
17368805 are
17375226 stored
17381647 in
17388068 sequential
17394489 memory
17400910 positions
17407331 It
17413752 also
17420173 dispenses
17426594 with
17433015 the
17439436 next
17445857 pointers
17452278 that
17458699 are
17465120 required
17471541 by
17477962 linked
17484383 lists
17490804 which
17497225 saves
17503646 space
17510067 Despite
17516488 frequent
17522909 array
17529330 resizing
17535751 space
17542172 overheads
17548593 incurred
17555014 by
17561435 operating
17567856 system
17574277 such
17580698 as
17587119 memory
17593540 fragmentation
17599961 were
17606382 found
17612803 to
17619224 be
17625645 small
17632066 An
17638487 elaboration
17644908 on
17651329 this
17657750 approach
17664171 is
17670592 the
17677013 so
17683434 called
17689855 dynamic
17696276 perfect
17702697 hashing
17709118 11
17715539 where
17721960 a
17728381 bucket
17734802 that
17741223 contains
17747644 k
17754065 entries
17760486 is
17766907 organized
17773328 as
17779749 a
17786170 perfect
17792591 hash
17799012 table
17805433 with
17811854 k2
17818275 slots
17824696 While
17831117 it
17837538 uses
17843959 more
17850380 memory
17856801 n2
17863222 slots
17869643 for
17876064 n
17882485 entries
17888906 in
17895327 the
17901748 worst
17908169 case
17914590 and
17921011 n
17927432 k
17933853 slots
17940274 in
17946695 the
17953116 average
17959537 case
17965958 this
17972379 variant
17978800 has
17985221 guaranteed
17991642 constant
17998063 worst
18004484 case
18010905 lookup
18017326 time
18023747 and
18030168 low
18036589 amortized
18043010 time
18049431 for
18055852 insertion
18062273 Open
18068694 addressing
18075115 Hash
18081536 collision
18087957 resolved
18094378 by
18100799 open
18107220 addressing
18113641 with
18120062 linear
18126483 probing
18132904 interval
18139325 1
18145746 Note
18152167 that
18158588 Ted
18165009 Baker
18171430 has
18177851 a
18184272 unique
18190693 hash
18197114 but
18203535 nevertheless
18209956 collided
18216377 with
18222798 Sandra
18229219 Dee
18235640 that
18242061 had
18248482 previously
18254903 collided
18261324 with
18267745 John
18274166 Smith
18280587 In
18287008 another
18293429 strategy
18299850 called
18306271 open
18312692 addressing
18319113 all
18325534 entry
18331955 records
18338376 are
18344797 stored
18351218 in
18357639 the
18364060 bucket
18370481 array
18376902 itself
18383323 When
18389744 a
18396165 new
18402586 entry
18409007 has
18415428 to
18421849 be
18428270 inserted
18434691 the
18441112 buckets
18447533 are
18453954 examined
18460375 starting
18466796 with
18473217 the
18479638 hashed
18486059 to
18492480 slot
18498901 and
18505322 proceeding
18511743 in
18518164 some
18524585 probe
18531006 sequence
18537427 until
18543848 an
18550269 unoccupied
18556690 slot
18563111 is
18569532 found
18575953 When
18582374 searching
18588795 for
18595216 an
18601637 entry
18608058 the
18614479 buckets
18620900 are
18627321 scanned
18633742 in
18640163 the
18646584 same
18653005 sequence
18659426 until
18665847 either
18672268 the
18678689 target
18685110 record
18691531 is
18697952 found
18704373 or
18710794 an
18717215 unused
18723636 array
18730057 slot
18736478 is
18742899 found
18749320 which
18755741 indicates
18762162 that
18768583 there
18775004 is
18781425 no
18787846 such
18794267 key
18800688 in
18807109 the
18813530 table12
18819951 The
18826372 name
18832793 open
18839214 addressing
18845635 refers
18852056 to
18858477 the
18864898 fact
18871319 that
18877740 the
18884161 location
18890582 address
18897003 of
18903424 the
18909845 item
18916266 is
18922687 not
18929108 determined
18935529 by
18941950 its
18948371 hash
18954792 value
18961213 This
18967634 method
18974055 is
18980476 also
18986897 called
18993318 closed
18999739 hashing
19006160 it
19012581 should
19019002 not
19025423 be
19031844 confused
19038265 with
19044686 open
19051107 hashing
19057528 or
19063949 closed
19070370 addressing
19076791 that
19083212 usually
19089633 mean
19096054 separate
19102475 chaining
19108896 Well
19115317 known
19121738 probe
19128159 sequences
19134580 include
19141001 Linear
19147422 probing
19153843 in
19160264 which
19166685 the
19173106 interval
19179527 between
19185948 probes
19192369 is
19198790 fixed
19205211 usually
19211632 1
19218053 Quadratic
19224474 probing
19230895 in
19237316 which
19243737 the
19250158 interval
19256579 between
19263000 probes
19269421 is
19275842 increased
19282263 by
19288684 adding
19295105 the
19301526 successive
19307947 outputs
19314368 of
19320789 a
19327210 quadratic
19333631 polynomial
19340052 to
19346473 the
19352894 starting
19359315 value
19365736 given
19372157 by
19378578 the
19384999 original
19391420 hash
19397841 computation
19404262 Double
19410683 hashing
19417104 in
19423525 which
19429946 the
19436367 interval
19442788 between
19449209 probes
19455630 is
19462051 computed
19468472 by
19474893 another
19481314 hash
19487735 function
19494156 A
19500577 drawback
19506998 of
19513419 all
19519840 these
19526261 open
19532682 addressing
19539103 schemes
19545524 is
19551945 that
19558366 the
19564787 number
19571208 of
19577629 stored
19584050 entries
19590471 cannot
19596892 exceed
19603313 the
19609734 number
19616155 of
19622576 slots
19628997 in
19635418 the
19641839 bucket
19648260 array
19654681 In
19661102 fact
19667523 even
19673944 with
19680365 good
19686786 hash
19693207 functions
19699628 their
19706049 performance
19712470 dramatically
19718891 degrades
19725312 when
19731733 the
19738154 load
19744575 factor
19750996 grows
19757417 beyond
19763838 07
19770259 or
19776680 so
19783101 For
19789522 many
19795943 applications
19802364 these
19808785 restrictions
19815206 mandate
19821627 the
19828048 use
19834469 of
19840890 dynamic
19847311 resizing
19853732 with
19860153 its
19866574 attendant
19872995 costs
19879416 Open
19885837 addressing
19892258 schemes
19898679 also
19905100 put
19911521 more
19917942 stringent
19924363 requirements
19930784 on
19937205 the
19943626 hash
19950047 function
19956468 besides
19962889 distributing
19969310 the
19975731 keys
19982152 more
19988573 uniformly
19994994 over
20001415 the
20007836 buckets
20014257 the
20020678 function
20027099 must
20033520 also
20039941 minimize
20046362 the
20052783 clustering
20059204 of
20065625 hash
20072046 values
20078467 that
20084888 are
20091309 consecutive
20097730 in
20104151 the
20110572 probe
20116993 order
20123414 Using
20129835 separate
20136256 chaining
20142677 the
20149098 only
20155519 concern
20161940 is
20168361 that
20174782 too
20181203 many
20187624 objects
20194045 map
20200466 to
20206887 the
20213308 same
20219729 hash
20226150 value
20232571 whether
20238992 they
20245413 are
20251834 adjacent
20258255 or
20264676 nearby
20271097 is
20277518 completely
20283939 irrelevant
20290360 Open
20296781 addressing
20303202 only
20309623 saves
20316044 memory
20322465 if
20328886 the
20335307 entries
20341728 are
20348149 small
20354570 less
20360991 than
20367412 four
20373833 times
20380254 the
20386675 size
20393096 of
20399517 a
20405938 pointer
20412359 and
20418780 the
20425201 load
20431622 factor
20438043 is
20444464 not
20450885 too
20457306 small
20463727 If
20470148 the
20476569 load
20482990 factor
20489411 is
20495832 close
20502253 to
20508674 zero
20515095 that
20521516 is
20527937 there
20534358 are
20540779 far
20547200 more
20553621 buckets
20560042 than
20566463 stored
20572884 entries
20579305 open
20585726 addressing
20592147 is
20598568 wasteful
20604989 even
20611410 if
20617831 each
20624252 entry
20630673 is
20637094 just
20643515 two
20649936 words
20656357 This
20662778 graph
20669199 compares
20675620 the
20682041 average
20688462 number
20694883 of
20701304 cache
20707725 misses
20714146 required
20720567 to
20726988 look
20733409 up
20739830 elements
20746251 in
20752672 tables
20759093 with
20765514 chaining
20771935 and
20778356 linear
20784777 probing
20791198 As
20797619 the
20804040 table
20810461 passes
20816882 the
20823303 80
20829724 full
20836145 mark
20842566 linear
20848987 probings
20855408 performance
20861829 drastically
20868250 degrades
20874671 Open
20881092 addressing
20887513 avoids
20893934 the
20900355 time
20906776 overhead
20913197 of
20919618 allocating
20926039 each
20932460 new
20938881 entry
20945302 record
20951723 and
20958144 can
20964565 be
20970986 implemented
20977407 even
20983828 in
20990249 the
20996670 absence
21003091 of
21009512 a
21015933 memory
21022354 allocator
21028775 It
21035196 also
21041617 avoids
21048038 the
21054459 extra
21060880 indirection
21067301 required
21073722 to
21080143 access
21086564 the
21092985 first
21099406 entry
21105827 of
21112248 each
21118669 bucket
21125090 that
21131511 is
21137932 usually
21144353 the
21150774 only
21157195 one
21163616 It
21170037 also
21176458 has
21182879 better
21189300 locality
21195721 of
21202142 reference
21208563 particularly
21214984 with
21221405 linear
21227826 probing
21234247 With
21240668 small
21247089 record
21253510 sizes
21259931 these
21266352 factors
21272773 can
21279194 yield
21285615 better
21292036 performance
21298457 than
21304878 chaining
21311299 particularly
21317720 for
21324141 lookups
21330562 Hash
21336983 tables
21343404 with
21349825 open
21356246 addressing
21362667 are
21369088 also
21375509 easier
21381930 to
21388351 serialize
21394772 because
21401193 they
21407614 do
21414035 not
21420456 use
21426877 pointers
21433298 On
21439719 the
21446140 other
21452561 hand
21458982 normal
21465403 open
21471824 addressing
21478245 is
21484666 a
21491087 poor
21497508 choice
21503929 for
21510350 large
21516771 elements
21523192 because
21529613 these
21536034 elements
21542455 fill
21548876 entire
21555297 CPU
21561718 cache
21568139 lines
21574560 negating
21580981 the
21587402 cache
21593823 advantage
21600244 and
21606665 a
21613086 large
21619507 amount
21625928 of
21632349 space
21638770 is
21645191 wasted
21651612 on
21658033 large
21664454 empty
21670875 table
21677296 slots
21683717 If
21690138 the
21696559 open
21702980 addressing
21709401 table
21715822 only
21722243 stores
21728664 references
21735085 to
21741506 elements
21747927 external
21754348 storage
21760769 it
21767190 uses
21773611 space
21780032 comparable
21786453 to
21792874 chaining
21799295 even
21805716 for
21812137 large
21818558 records
21824979 but
21831400 loses
21837821 its
21844242 speed
21850663 advantage
21857084 Generally
21863505 speaking
21869926 open
21876347 addressing
21882768 is
21889189 better
21895610 used
21902031 for
21908452 hash
21914873 tables
21921294 with
21927715 small
21934136 records
21940557 that
21946978 can
21953399 be
21959820 stored
21966241 within
21972662 the
21979083 table
21985504 internal
21991925 storage
21998346 and
22004767 fit
22011188 in
22017609 a
22024030 cache
22030451 line
22036872 They
22043293 are
22049714 particularly
22056135 suitable
22062556 for
22068977 elements
22075398 of
22081819 one
22088240 word
22094661 or
22101082 less
22107503 If
22113924 the
22120345 table
22126766 is
22133187 expected
22139608 to
22146029 have
22152450 a
22158871 high
22165292 load
22171713 factor
22178134 the
22184555 records
22190976 are
22197397 large
22203818 or
22210239 the
22216660 data
22223081 is
22229502 variable
22235923 sized
22242344 chained
22248765 hash
22255186 tables
22261607 often
22268028 perform
22274449 as
22280870 well
22287291 or
22293712 better
22300133 Ultimately
22306554 used
22312975 sensibly
22319396 any
22325817 kind
22332238 of
22338659 hash
22345080 table
22351501 algorithm
22357922 is
22364343 usually
22370764 fast
22377185 enough
22383606 and
22390027 the
22396448 percentage
22402869 of
22409290 a
22415711 calculation
22422132 spent
22428553 in
22434974 hash
22441395 table
22447816 code
22454237 is
22460658 low
22467079 Memory
22473500 usage
22479921 is
22486342 rarely
22492763 considered
22499184 excessive
22505605 Therefore
22512026 in
22518447 most
22524868 cases
22531289 the
22537710 differences
22544131 between
22550552 these
22556973 algorithms
22563394 are
22569815 marginal
22576236 and
22582657 other
22589078 considerations
22595499 typically
22601920 come
22608341 into
22614762 play
22621183 Coalesced
22627604 hashing
22634025 A
22640446 hybrid
22646867 of
22653288 chaining
22659709 and
22666130 open
22672551 addressing
22678972 coalesced
22685393 hashing
22691814 links
22698235 together
22704656 chains
22711077 of
22717498 nodes
22723919 within
22730340 the
22736761 table
22743182 itself12
22749603 Like
22756024 open
22762445 addressing
22768866 it
22775287 achieves
22781708 space
22788129 usage
22794550 and
22800971 somewhat
22807392 diminished
22813813 cache
22820234 advantages
22826655 over
22833076 chaining
22839497 Like
22845918 chaining
22852339 it
22858760 does
22865181 not
22871602 exhibit
22878023 clustering
22884444 effects
22890865 in
22897286 fact
22903707 the
22910128 table
22916549 can
22922970 be
22929391 efficiently
22935812 filled
22942233 to
22948654 a
22955075 high
22961496 density
22967917 Unlike
22974338 chaining
22980759 it
22987180 cannot
22993601 have
23000022 more
23006443 elements
23012864 than
23019285 table
23025706 slots
23032127 Cuckoo
23038548 hashing
23044969 Another
23051390 alternative
23057811 open
23064232 addressing
23070653 solution
23077074 is
23083495 cuckoo
23089916 hashing
23096337 which
23102758 ensures
23109179 constant
23115600 lookup
23122021 time
23128442 in
23134863 the
23141284 worst
23147705 case
23154126 and
23160547 constant
23166968 amortized
23173389 time
23179810 for
23186231 insertions
23192652 and
23199073 deletions
23205494 It
23211915 uses
23218336 two
23224757 or
23231178 more
23237599 hash
23244020 functions
23250441 which
23256862 means
23263283 any
23269704 key
23276125 value
23282546 pair
23288967 could
23295388 be
23301809 in
23308230 two
23314651 or
23321072 more
23327493 locations
23333914 For
23340335 lookup
23346756 the
23353177 first
23359598 hash
23366019 function
23372440 is
23378861 used
23385282 if
23391703 the
23398124 key
23404545 value
23410966 is
23417387 not
23423808 found
23430229 then
23436650 the
23443071 second
23449492 hash
23455913 function
23462334 is
23468755 used
23475176 and
23481597 so
23488018 on
23494439 If
23500860 a
23507281 collision
23513702 happens
23520123 during
23526544 insertion
23532965 then
23539386 the
23545807 key
23552228 is
23558649 re
23565070 hashed
23571491 with
23577912 the
23584333 second
23590754 hash
23597175 function
23603596 to
23610017 map
23616438 it
23622859 to
23629280 another
23635701 bucket
23642122 If
23648543 all
23654964 hash
23661385 functions
23667806 are
23674227 used
23680648 and
23687069 there
23693490 is
23699911 still
23706332 a
23712753 collision
23719174 then
23725595 the
23732016 key
23738437 it
23744858 collided
23751279 with
23757700 is
23764121 removed
23770542 to
23776963 make
23783384 space
23789805 for
23796226 the
23802647 new
23809068 key
23815489 and
23821910 the
23828331 old
23834752 key
23841173 is
23847594 re
23854015 hashed
23860436 with
23866857 one
23873278 of
23879699 the
23886120 other
23892541 hash
23898962 functions
23905383 which
23911804 maps
23918225 it
23924646 to
23931067 another
23937488 bucket
23943909 If
23950330 that
23956751 location
23963172 also
23969593 results
23976014 in
23982435 a
23988856 collision
23995277 then
24001698 the
24008119 process
24014540 repeats
24020961 until
24027382 there
24033803 is
24040224 no
24046645 collision
24053066 or
24059487 the
24065908 process
24072329 traverses
24078750 all
24085171 the
24091592 buckets
24098013 at
24104434 which
24110855 point
24117276 the
24123697 table
24130118 is
24136539 resized
24142960 By
24149381 combining
24155802 multiple
24162223 hash
24168644 functions
24175065 with
24181486 multiple
24187907 cells
24194328 per
24200749 bucket
24207170 very
24213591 high
24220012 space
24226433 utilisation
24232854 can
24239275 be
24245696 achieved
24252117 Hopscotch
24258538 hashing
24264959 Another
24271380 alternative
24277801 open
24284222 addressing
24290643 solution
24297064 is
24303485 hopscotch
24309906 hashing
24316327 13
24322748 which
24329169 combines
24335590 the
24342011 approaches
24348432 of
24354853 cuckoo
24361274 hashing
24367695 and
24374116 linear
24380537 probing
24386958 yet
24393379 seems
24399800 in
24406221 general
24412642 to
24419063 avoid
24425484 their
24431905 limitations
24438326 In
24444747 particular
24451168 it
24457589 works
24464010 well
24470431 even
24476852 when
24483273 the
24489694 load
24496115 factor
24502536 grows
24508957 beyond
24515378 09
24521799 The
24528220 algorithm
24534641 is
24541062 well
24547483 suited
24553904 for
24560325 implementing
24566746 a
24573167 resizable
24579588 concurrent
24586009 hash
24592430 table
24598851 The
24605272 hopscotch
24611693 hashing
24618114 algorithm
24624535 works
24630956 by
24637377 defining
24643798 a
24650219 neighborhood
24656640 of
24663061 buckets
24669482 near
24675903 the
24682324 original
24688745 hashed
24695166 bucket
24701587 where
24708008 a
24714429 given
24720850 entry
24727271 is
24733692 always
24740113 found
24746534 Thus
24752955 search
24759376 is
24765797 limited
24772218 to
24778639 the
24785060 number
24791481 of
24797902 entries
24804323 in
24810744 this
24817165 neighborhood
24823586 which
24830007 is
24836428 logarithmic
24842849 in
24849270 the
24855691 worst
24862112 case
24868533 constant
24874954 on
24881375 average
24887796 and
24894217 with
24900638 proper
24907059 alignment
24913480 of
24919901 the
24926322 neighborhood
24932743 typically
24939164 requires
24945585 one
24952006 cache
24958427 miss
24964848 When
24971269 inserting
24977690 an
24984111 entry
24990532 one
24996953 first
25003374 attempts
25009795 to
25016216 add
25022637 it
25029058 to
25035479 a
25041900 bucket
25048321 in
25054742 the
25061163 neighborhood
25067584 However
25074005 if
25080426 all
25086847 buckets
25093268 in
25099689 this
25106110 neighborhood
25112531 are
25118952 occupied
25125373 the
25131794 algorithm
25138215 traverses
25144636 buckets
25151057 in
25157478 sequence
25163899 until
25170320 an
25176741 open
25183162 slot
25189583 an
25196004 unoccupied
25202425 bucket
25208846 is
25215267 found
25221688 as
25228109 in
25234530 linear
25240951 probing
25247372 At
25253793 that
25260214 point
25266635 since
25273056 the
25279477 empty
25285898 bucket
25292319 is
25298740 outside
25305161 the
25311582 neighborhood
25318003 items
25324424 are
25330845 repeatedly
25337266 displaced
25343687 in
25350108 a
25356529 sequence
25362950 of
25369371 hops
25375792 This
25382213 is
25388634 similar
25395055 to
25401476 cuckoo
25407897 hashing
25414318 but
25420739 with
25427160 the
25433581 difference
25440002 that
25446423 in
25452844 this
25459265 case
25465686 the
25472107 empty
25478528 slot
25484949 is
25491370 being
25497791 moved
25504212 into
25510633 the
25517054 neighborhood
25523475 instead
25529896 of
25536317 items
25542738 being
25549159 moved
25555580 out
25562001 with
25568422 the
25574843 hope
25581264 of
25587685 eventually
25594106 finding
25600527 an
25606948 empty
25613369 slot
25619790 Each
25626211 hop
25632632 brings
25639053 the
25645474 open
25651895 slot
25658316 closer
25664737 to
25671158 the
25677579 original
25684000 neighborhood
25690421 without
25696842 invalidating
25703263 the
25709684 neighborhood
25716105 property
25722526 of
25728947 any
25735368 of
25741789 the
25748210 buckets
25754631 along
25761052 the
25767473 way
25773894 In
25780315 the
25786736 end
25793157 the
25799578 open
25805999 slot
25812420 has
25818841 been
25825262 moved
25831683 into
25838104 the
25844525 neighborhood
25850946 and
25857367 the
25863788 entry
25870209 being
25876630 inserted
25883051 can
25889472 be
25895893 added
25902314 to
25908735 it
25915156 Robin
25921577 Hood
25927998 hashing
25934419 One
25940840 interesting
25947261 variation
25953682 on
25960103 double
25966524 hashing
25972945 collision
25979366 resolution
25985787 is
25992208 Robin
25998629 Hood
26005050 hashing1415
26011471 The
26017892 idea
26024313 is
26030734 that
26037155 a
26043576 new
26049997 key
26056418 may
26062839 displace
26069260 a
26075681 key
26082102 already
26088523 inserted
26094944 if
26101365 its
26107786 probe
26114207 count
26120628 is
26127049 larger
26133470 than
26139891 that
26146312 of
26152733 the
26159154 key
26165575 at
26171996 the
26178417 current
26184838 position
26191259 The
26197680 net
26204101 effect
26210522 of
26216943 this
26223364 is
26229785 that
26236206 it
26242627 reduces
26249048 worst
26255469 case
26261890 search
26268311 times
26274732 in
26281153 the
26287574 table
26293995 This
26300416 is
26306837 similar
26313258 to
26319679 ordered
26326100 hash
26332521 tables16
26338942 except

26358205 criterion
26364626 for
26371047 bumping

26383889 key

26396731 not
26403152 depend

26415994 a
26422415 direct
26428836 relationship
26435257 between
26441678 the
26448099 keys
26454520 Since

26480204 case

26505888 in

26525151 of
26531572 probes
26537993 is
26544414 reduced
26550835 dramatically

26563677 interesting

26589361 probe
26595782 the

26627887 expected

26647150 value

26666413 expand
26672834 from
26679255 that
26685676 position
26692097 in
26698518 both
26704939 directions17
26711360 External
26717781 Robin
26724202 Hashing
26730623 is
26737044 an
26743465 extension
26749886 of
26756307 this

26769149 where

26903990 with
26910411 B
26916832 records18

26929674 choice

26948937 choice

26961779 employs
26968200 2
26974621 different

27013147 for

27058094 are
27064515 used
27070936 to
27077357 compute

27090199 table

27205777 that
27212198 contains
27218619 fewer
27225040 objects
27231461 with
27237882 the
27244303 default

27257145 the
27263566 h1x

27295671 is
27302092 equality
27308513 in

27321355 size

27334197 choice

27347039 employs
27353460 the
27359881 principle
27366302 of
27372723 the
27379144 power

27391986 two
27398407 choices19

27944192 serious
27950613 although

29427443 to
29433864 the
29440285 deallocation

29472390 by

29517337 is
29523758 to
29530179 automatically
29536600 trigger

29549442 complete

29793440 to
29799861 the
29806282 free

29819124 pool

29851229 factor
29857650 falls
29864071 below

29896176 all

29909018 are
29915439 moved
29921860 to
29928281 a
29934702 new
29941123 smaller
29947544 table

29960386 the

29973228 size
29979649 increases

30011754 fixed
30018175 percentage
30024596 at

30037438 expansion

30621749 roughly
30628170 doubles
30634591 the
30641012 cost
30647433 of
30653854 each
30660275 insert
30666696 or
30673117 delete
30679538 operation
30685959 Incremental
30692380 resizing
30698801 Some
30705222 hash
30711643 table
30718064 implementations
30724485 notably
30730906 in
30737327 real
30743748 time
30750169 systems
30756590 cannot
30763011 pay
30769432 the
30775853 price
30782274 of
30788695 enlarging
30795116 the
30801537 hash
30807958 table
30814379 all
30820800 at
30827221 once
30833642 because
30840063 it
30846484 may
30852905 interrupt
30859326 time
30865747 critical
30872168 operations
30878589 If
30885010 one
30891431 cannot
30897852 avoid
30904273 dynamic
30910694 resizing
30917115 a
30923536 solution
61912901 is
61925754 to
61938607 perform
61951460 the
61964313 resizing
61977166 gradually
61990019 During
62002872 the
62015725 resize
62028578 allocate
62041431 the
62054284 new
62067137 hash
62079990 table
62092843 but
62105696 keep
62118549 the
62131402 old
62144255 table
62157108 unchanged
62169961 In
62182814 each
62195667 lookup
62208520 or

62234226 operation
62247079 check
62259932 both
62272785 tables
62285638 Perform
62298491 insertion
62311344 operations
62324197 only
62337050 in
62349903 the
62362756 new
62375609 table

62401315 each
62414168 insertion
62427021 also
62439874 move
62452727 r
62465580 elements
62478433 from
62491286 the
62504139 old

62542698 the
62555551 new

62594110 all
62606963 elements
62619816 are
62632669 removed
62645522 from
62658375 the
62671228 old

62709787 it
62722640 To
62735493 ensure
62748346 that
62761199 the
62774052 old

62799758 is
62812611 completely

62851170 before

62876876 new

63133936 of
63146789 at
63159642 least
63172495 r
63185348 1
63198201 r
63211054 during
63223907 resizing
63236760 Monotonic
63249613 keys
63262466 If
63275319 it
63288172 is
63301025 known
63313878 that
63326731 key
63339584 values
63352437 will
63365290 always
63378143 increase
63390996 or
63403849 decrease
63416702 monotonically
63429555 then
63442408 a
63455261 variation
63468114 of
63480967 consistent
