63506673 can
63519526 be
63532379 achieved
63545232 by
63558085 keeping
63570938 a
63583791 list
63596644 of
63609497 the
63622350 single
63635203 most
63648056 recent
63660909 key
63673762 value
63686615 at
63699468 each
63712321 hash
63725174 table
63738027 resize
63750880 operation
63763733 Upon
63776586 lookup
63789439 keys
63802292 that
63815145 fall
63827998 in
63840851 the
63853704 ranges
63866557 defined
63879410 by
63892263 these
63905116 list
63917969 entries
63930822 are
63943675 directed
63956528 to
63969381 the
63982234 appropriate
63995087 hash
64007940 function
64020793 and
64033646 indeed
64046499 hash
64059352 table
64072205 both
64085058 of
64097911 which
64110764 can
64123617 be
64136470 different
64149323 for
64162176 each
64175029 range
64187882 Since
64200735 it
64213588 is
64226441 common
64239294 to
64252147 grow
64265000 the
64277853 overall
64290706 number
64303559 of
64316412 entries
64329265 by
64342118 doubling
64354971 there
64367824 will
64380677 only
64393530 be
64406383 OlgN
64419236 ranges
64432089 to
64444942 check
64457795 and
64470648 binary
64483501 search
64496354 time
64509207 for
64522060 the
64534913 redirection
64547766 would
64560619 be
64573472 OlglgN
64586325 As
64599178 with
64612031 consistent
64624884 hashing
64637737 this
64650590 approach
64663443 guarantees
64676296 that
64689149 any
64702002 keys
64714855 hash
64727708 once
64740561 issued
64753414 will
64766267 never
64779120 change
64791973 even
64804826 when
64817679 the
64830532 hash
64843385 table
64856238 is
64869091 later
64881944 grown
64894797 Other
64907650 solutions
64920503 Linear
64933356 hashing20
64946209 is
64959062 a
64971915 hash
64984768 table
64997621 algorithm
65010474 that
65023327 permits
65036180 incremental
65049033 hash
65061886 table
65074739 expansion
65087592 It
65100445 is
65113298 implemented
65126151 using
65139004 a
65151857 single
65164710 hash
65177563 table
65190416 but
65203269 with
65216122 two
65228975 possible
65241828 look
65254681 up
65267534 functions
65280387 Another
65293240 way
65306093 to
65318946 decrease
65331799 the
65344652 cost
65357505 of
65370358 table
65383211 resizing
65396064 is
65408917 to
65421770 choose
65434623 a
65447476 hash
65460329 function
65473182 in
65486035 such
65498888 a
65511741 way
65524594 that
65537447 the
65550300 hashes
65563153 of
65576006 most
65588859 values
65601712 do
65614565 not
65627418 change
65640271 when
65653124 the
65665977 table
65678830 is
65691683 resized
65704536 This
65717389 approach
65730242 called
65743095 consistent
65755948 hashing
65768801 is
65781654 prevalent
65794507 in
65807360 disk
65820213 based
65833066 and
65845919 distributed
65858772 hashes
65871625 where
65884478 rehashing
65897331 is
65910184 prohibitively
65923037 costly
65935890 Performance
65948743 analysis
65961596 In
65974449 the
65987302 simplest
66000155 model
66013008 the
66025861 hash
66038714 function
66051567 is
66064420 completely
66077273 unspecified
66090126 and
66102979 the
66115832 table
66128685 does
66141538 not
66154391 resize
66167244 For
66180097 the
66192950 best
66205803 possible
66218656 choice
66231509 of
66244362 hash
66257215 function
66270068 a
66282921 table
66295774 of
66308627 size
66321480 k
66334333 with
66347186 open
66360039 addressing
66372892 has
66385745 no
66398598 collisions
66411451 and
66424304 holds
66437157 up
66450010 to
66462863 k
66475716 elements
66488569 with
66501422 a
66514275 single
66527128 comparison
66539981 for
66552834 successful
66565687 lookup
66578540 and
66591393 a
66604246 table
66617099 of
66629952 size
66642805 k
66655658 with
66668511 chaining
66681364 and
66694217 n
66707070 keys
66719923 has
66732776 the
66745629 minimum
66758482 max0
66771335 n
66784188 k
66797041 collisions
66809894 and
66822747 O1
66835600 n
66848453 k
66861306 comparisons
66874159 for
66887012 lookup
66899865 For
66912718 the
66925571 worst
66938424 choice
66951277 of
66964130 hash
66976983 function
66989836 every
67002689 insertion
67015542 causes
67028395 a
67041248 collision
67054101 and
67066954 hash
67079807 tables
67092660 degenerate
67105513 to
67118366 linear
67131219 search
67144072 with
67156925 Ωn
67169778 amortized
67182631 comparisons
67195484 per
67208337 insertion
67221190 and
67234043 up
67246896 to
67259749 n
67272602 comparisons
67285455 for
67298308 a
67311161 successful
67324014 lookup
67336867 Adding
67349720 rehashing
67362573 to
67375426 this
67388279 model
67401132 is
67413985 straightforward
67426838 As
67439691 in
67452544 a
67465397 dynamic
67478250 array
67491103 geometric
67503956 resizing
67516809 by
67529662 a
67542515 factor
67555368 of
67568221 b
67581074 implies
67593927 that
67606780 only
67619633 n
67632486 bi
67645339 keys
67658192 are
67671045 inserted
67683898 i
67696751 or
67709604 more
67722457 times
67735310 so
67748163 that
67761016 the
67773869 total
67786722 number
67799575 of
67812428 insertions
67825281 is
67838134 bounded
67850987 above
67863840 by
67876693 bn
67889546 b
67902399 1
67915252 which
67928105 is
67940958 On
67953811 By
67966664 using
67979517 rehashing
67992370 to
68005223 maintain
68018076 n
68030929 k
68043782 tables
68056635 using
68069488 both
68082341 chaining
68095194 and
68108047 open
68120900 addressing
68133753 can
68146606 have
68159459 unlimited
68172312 elements
68185165 and
68198018 perform
68210871 successful
68223724 lookup
68236577 in
68249430 a
68262283 single
68275136 comparison
68287989 for
68300842 the
68313695 best
68326548 choice
68339401 of
68352254 hash
68365107 function
68377960 In
68390813 more
68403666 realistic
68416519 models
68429372 the
68442225 hash
68455078 function
68467931 is
68480784 a
68493637 random
68506490 variable
68519343 over
68532196 a
68545049 probability
68557902 distribution
68570755 of
68583608 hash
68596461 functions
68609314 and
68622167 performance
68635020 is
68647873 computed
68660726 on
68673579 average
68686432 over
68699285 the
68712138 choice
68724991 of
68737844 hash
68750697 function
68763550 When
68776403 this
68789256 distribution
68802109 is
68814962 uniform
68827815 the
68840668 assumption
68853521 is
68866374 called
68879227 simple
68892080 uniform
68904933 hashing
68917786 and
68930639 it
68943492 can
68956345 be
68969198 shown
68982051 that
68994904 hashing
69007757 with
69020610 chaining
69033463 requires
69046316 Θ1
69059169 n
69072022 k
69084875 comparisons
69097728 on
69110581 average
69123434 for
69136287 an
69149140 unsuccessful
69161993 lookup
69174846 and
69187699 hashing
69200552 with
69213405 open
69226258 addressing
69239111 requires
69251964 Θ1
69264817 1
69277670 n
69290523 k21
69303376 Both
69316229 these
69329082 bounds
69341935 are
69354788 constant
69367641 if
69380494 we
69393347 maintain
69406200 n
69419053 k
69431906 c
69444759 using
69457612 table
69470465 resizing
69483318 where
69496171 c
69509024 is
69521877 a
69534730 fixed
69547583 constant
69560436 less
69573289 than
69586142 1
69598995 Features
69611848 Advantages
69624701 The
69637554 main
69650407 advantage
69663260 of
69676113 hash
69688966 tables
69701819 over
69714672 other
69727525 table
69740378 data
69753231 structures
69766084 is
69778937 speed
69791790 This
69804643 advantage
69817496 is
69830349 more
69843202 apparent
69856055 when
69868908 the
69881761 number
69894614 of
69907467 entries
69920320 is
69933173 large
69946026 Hash
69958879 tables
69971732 are
69984585 particularly
69997438 efficient
70010291 when
70023144 the
70035997 maximum
70048850 number
70061703 of
70074556 entries
70087409 can
70100262 be
70113115 predicted
70125968 in
70138821 advance
70151674 so
70164527 that
70177380 the
70190233 bucket
70203086 array
70215939 can
70228792 be
70241645 allocated
70254498 once
70267351 with
70280204 the
70293057 optimum
70305910 size
70318763 and
70331616 never
70344469 resized
70357322 If
70370175 the
70383028 set
70395881 of
70408734 key
70421587 value
70434440 pairs
70447293 is
70460146 fixed
70472999 and
70485852 known
70498705 ahead
70511558 of
70524411 time
70537264 so
70550117 insertions
70562970 and
70575823 deletions
70588676 are
70601529 not
70614382 allowed
70627235 one
70640088 may
70652941 reduce
70665794 the
70678647 average
70691500 lookup
70704353 cost
70717206 by
70730059 a
70742912 careful
70755765 choice
70768618 of
70781471 the
70794324 hash
70807177 function
70820030 bucket
70832883 table
70845736 size
70858589 and
70871442 internal
70884295 data
70897148 structures
70910001 In
70922854 particular
70935707 one
70948560 may
70961413 be
70974266 able
70987119 to
70999972 devise
71012825 a
71025678 hash
71038531 function
71051384 that
71064237 is
71077090 collision
71089943 free
71102796 or
71115649 even
71128502 perfect
71141355 see
71154208 below
71167061 In
71179914 this
71192767 case
71205620 the
71218473 keys
71231326 need
71244179 not
71257032 be
71269885 stored
71282738 in
71295591 the
71308444 table
71321297 Drawbacks
71334150 Although
71347003 operations
71359856 on
71372709 a
71385562 hash
71398415 table
71411268 take
71424121 constant
71436974 time
71449827 on
71462680 average
71475533 the
71488386 cost
71501239 of
71514092 a
71526945 good
71539798 hash
71552651 function
71565504 can
71578357 be
71591210 significantly
71604063 higher
71616916 than
71629769 the
71642622 inner
71655475 loop
71668328 of
71681181 the
71694034 lookup
71706887 algorithm
71719740 for
71732593 a
71745446 sequential
71758299 list
71771152 or
71784005 search
71796858 tree
71809711 Thus
71822564 hash
71835417 tables
71848270 are
71861123 not
71873976 effective
71886829 when
71899682 the
71912535 number
71925388 of
71938241 entries
71951094 is
71963947 very
71976800 small
71989653 However
72002506 in
72015359 some
72028212 cases
72041065 the
72053918 high
72066771 cost
72079624 of
72092477 computing
72105330 the
72118183 hash
72131036 function
72143889 can
72156742 be
72169595 mitigated
72182448 by
72195301 saving
72208154 the
72221007 hash
72233860 value
72246713 together
72259566 with
72272419 the
72285272 key
72298125 For
72310978 certain
72323831 string
72336684 processing
72349537 applications
72362390 such
72375243 as
72388096 spell
72400949 checking
72413802 hash
72426655 tables
72439508 may
72452361 be
72465214 less
72478067 efficient
72490920 than
72503773 tries
72516626 finite
72529479 automata
72542332 or
72555185 Judy
72568038 arrays
72580891 Also
72593744 if
72606597 each
72619450 key
72632303 is
72645156 represented
72658009 by
72670862 a
72683715 small
72696568 enough
72709421 number
72722274 of
72735127 bits
72747980 then
72760833 instead
72773686 of
72786539 a
72799392 hash
72812245 table
72825098 one
72837951 may
72850804 use
72863657 the
72876510 key
72889363 directly
72902216 as
72915069 the
72927922 index
72940775 into
72953628 an
72966481 array
72979334 of
72992187 values
73005040 Note
73017893 that
73030746 there
73043599 are
73056452 no
73069305 collisions
73082158 in
73095011 this
73107864 case
73120717 The
73133570 entries
73146423 stored
73159276 in
73172129 a
73184982 hash
73197835 table
73210688 can
73223541 be
73236394 enumerated
73249247 efficiently
73262100 at
73274953 constant
73287806 cost
73300659 per
73313512 entry
73326365 but
73339218 only
73352071 in
73364924 some
73377777 pseudo
73390630 random
73403483 order
73416336 Therefore
73429189 there
73442042 is
73454895 no
73467748 efficient
73480601 way
73493454 to
73506307 locate
73519160 an
73532013 entry
73544866 whose
73557719 key
73570572 is
73583425 nearest
73596278 to
73609131 a
73621984 given
73634837 key
73647690 Listing
73660543 all
73673396 n
73686249 entries
73699102 in
73711955 some
73724808 specific
73737661 order
73750514 generally
73763367 requires
73776220 a
73789073 separate
73801926 sorting
73814779 step
73827632 whose
73840485 cost
73853338 is
73866191 proportional
73879044 to
73891897 logn
73904750 per
73917603 entry
73930456 In
73943309 comparison
73956162 ordered
73969015 search
73981868 trees
73994721 have
74007574 lookup
74020427 and
74033280 insertion
74046133 cost
74058986 proportional
74071839 to
74084692 logn
74097545 but
74110398 allow
74123251 finding
74136104 the
74148957 nearest
74161810 key
74174663 at
74187516 about
74200369 the
74213222 same
74226075 cost
74238928 and
74251781 ordered
74264634 enumeration
74277487 of
74290340 all
74303193 entries
74316046 at
74328899 constant
74341752 cost
74354605 per
74367458 entry
74380311 If
74393164 the
74406017 keys
74418870 are
74431723 not
74444576 stored
74457429 because
74470282 the
74483135 hash
74495988 function
74508841 is
74521694 collision
74534547 free
74547400 there
74560253 may
74573106 be
74585959 no
74598812 easy
74611665 way
74624518 to
74637371 enumerate
74650224 the
74663077 keys
74675930 that
74688783 are
74701636 present
74714489 in
74727342 the
74740195 table
74753048 at
74765901 any
74778754 given
74791607 moment
74804460 Although
74817313 the
74830166 average
74843019 cost
74855872 per
74868725 operation
74881578 is
74894431 constant
74907284 and
74920137 fairly
74932990 small
74945843 the
74958696 cost
74971549 of
74984402 a
74997255 single
75010108 operation
75022961 may
75035814 be
75048667 quite
75061520 high
75074373 In
75087226 particular
75100079 if
75112932 the
75125785 hash
75138638 table
75151491 uses
75164344 dynamic
75177197 resizing
75190050 an
75202903 insertion
75215756 or
75228609 deletion
75241462 operation
75254315 may
75267168 occasionally
75280021 take
75292874 time
75305727 proportional
75318580 to
75331433 the
75344286 number
75357139 of
75369992 entries
75382845 This
75395698 may
75408551 be
75421404 a
75434257 serious
75447110 drawback
75459963 in
75472816 real
75485669 time
75498522 or
75511375 interactive
75524228 applications
75537081 Hash
75549934 tables
75562787 in
75575640 general
75588493 exhibit
75601346 poor
75614199 locality
75627052 of
75639905 reference
75652758 that
75665611 is
75678464 the
75691317 data
75704170 to
75717023 be
75729876 accessed
75742729 is
75755582 distributed
75768435 seemingly
75781288 at
75794141 random
75806994 in
75819847 memory
75832700 Because
75845553 hash
75858406 tables
75871259 cause
75884112 access
75896965 patterns
75909818 that
75922671 jump
75935524 around
75948377 this
75961230 can
75974083 trigger
75986936 microprocessor
75999789 cache
76012642 misses
76025495 that
76038348 cause
76051201 long
76064054 delays
76076907 Compact
76089760 data
76102613 structures
76115466 such
76128319 as
76141172 arrays
76154025 searched
76166878 with
76179731 linear
76192584 search
76205437 may
76218290 be
76231143 faster
76243996 if
76256849 the
76269702 table
76282555 is
76295408 relatively
76308261 small
76321114 and
76333967 keys
76346820 are
76359673 compact
76372526 The
76385379 optimal
76398232 performance
76411085 point
76423938 varies
76436791 from
76449644 system
76462497 to
76475350 system
76488203 Hash
76501056 tables
76513909 become
76526762 quite
76539615 inefficient
76552468 when
76565321 there
76578174 are
76591027 many
76603880 collisions
76616733 While
76629586 extremely
76642439 uneven
76655292 hash
76668145 distributions
76680998 are
76693851 extremely
76706704 unlikely
76719557 to
76732410 arise
76745263 by
76758116 chance
76770969 a
76783822 malicious
76796675 adversary
76809528 with
76822381 knowledge
76835234 of
76848087 the
76860940 hash
76873793 function
76886646 may
76899499 be
76912352 able
76925205 to
76938058 supply
76950911 information
76963764 to
76976617 a
76989470 hash
77002323 that
77015176 creates
77028029 worst
77040882 case
77053735 behavior
77066588 by
77079441 causing
77092294 excessive
77105147 collisions
77118000 resulting
77130853 in
77143706 very
77156559 poor
77169412 performance
77182265 eg
77195118 a
77207971 denial
77220824 of
77233677 service
77246530 attack22
77259383 In
77272236 critical
77285089 applications
77297942 universal
77310795 hashing
77323648 can
77336501 be
77349354 used
77362207 a
77375060 data
77387913 structure
77400766 with
77413619 better
77426472 worst
77439325 case
77452178 guarantees
77465031 may
77477884 be
77490737 preferable23
77503590 Uses
77516443 Question
77529296 book
77542149 newsvg
77555002 This
77567855 section
77580708 does
77593561 not
77606414 cite
77619267 any
77632120 references
77644973 or
77657826 sources
77670679 Please
77683532 help
77696385 improve
77709238 this
77722091 section
77734944 by
77747797 adding
77760650 citations
77773503 to
77786356 reliable
77799209 sources
77812062 Unsourced
77824915 material
77837768 may
77850621 be
77863474 challenged
77876327 and
77889180 removed
77902033 July
77914886 2013
77927739 Associative
77940592 arrays
77953445 Hash
77966298 tables
77979151 are
77992004 commonly
78004857 used
78017710 to
78030563 implement
78043416 many
78056269 types
78069122 of
78081975 in
78094828 memory
78107681 tables
78120534 They
78133387 are
78146240 used
78159093 to
78171946 implement
78184799 associative
78197652 arrays
78210505 arrays
78223358 whose
78236211 indices
78249064 are
78261917 arbitrary
78274770 strings
78287623 or
78300476 other
78313329 complicated
78326182 objects
78339035 especially
78351888 in
78364741 interpreted
78377594 programming
78390447 languages
78403300 like
78416153 Ruby
78429006 Python
78441859 and
78454712 PHP
78467565 When
78480418 storing
78493271 a
78506124 new
78518977 item
78531830 into
78544683 a
78557536 multimap
78570389 and
78583242 a
78596095 hash
78608948 collision
78621801 occurs
78634654 the
78647507 multimap
78660360 unconditionally
78673213 stores
78686066 both
78698919 items
78711772 When
78724625 storing
78737478 a
78750331 new
78763184 item
78776037 into
78788890 a
78801743 typical
78814596 associative
78827449 array
78840302 and
78853155 a
78866008 hash
78878861 collision
78891714 occurs
78904567 but
78917420 the
78930273 actual
78943126 keys
78955979 themselves
78968832 are
78981685 different
78994538 the
79007391 associative
79020244 array
79033097 likewise
79045950 stores
79058803 both
79071656 items
79084509 However
79097362 if
79110215 the
79123068 key
79135921 of
79148774 the
79161627 new
79174480 item
79187333 exactly
79200186 matches
79213039 the
79225892 key
79238745 of
79251598 an
79264451 old
79277304 item
79290157 the
79303010 associative
79315863 array
79328716 typically
79341569 erases
79354422 the
79367275 old
79380128 item
79392981 and
79405834 overwrites
79418687 it
79431540 with
79444393 the
79457246 new
79470099 item
79482952 so
79495805 every
79508658 item
79521511 in
79534364 the
79547217 table
79560070 has
79572923 a
79585776 unique
79598629 key
79611482 Database
79624335 indexing
79637188 Hash
79650041 tables
79662894 may
79675747 also
79688600 be
79701453 used
79714306 as
79727159 disk
79740012 based
79752865 data
79765718 structures
79778571 and
79791424 database
79804277 indices
79817130 such
79829983 as
79842836 in
79855689 dbm
79868542 although
79881395 B
79894248 trees
79907101 are
79919954 more
79932807 popular
79945660 in
79958513 these
79971366 applications
79984219 Caches
79997072 Hash
80009925 tables
80022778 can
80035631 be
80048484 used
80061337 to
80074190 implement
80087043 caches
80099896 auxiliary
80112749 data
80125602 tables
80138455 that
80151308 are
80164161 used
80177014 to
80189867 speed
80202720 up
80215573 the
80228426 access
80241279 to
80254132 data
80266985 that
80279838 is
80292691 primarily
80305544 stored
80318397 in
80331250 slower
80344103 media
80356956 In
80369809 this
80382662 application
80395515 hash
80408368 collisions
80421221 can
80434074 be
80446927 handled
80459780 by
80472633 discarding
80485486 one
80498339 of
80511192 the
80524045 two
80536898 colliding
80549751 entries
80562604 usually
80575457 erasing
80588310 the
80601163 old
80614016 item
80626869 that
80639722 is
80652575 currently
80665428 stored
80678281 in
80691134 the
80703987 table
80716840 and
80729693 overwriting
80742546 it
80755399 with
80768252 the
80781105 new
80793958 item
80806811 so
80819664 every
80832517 item
80845370 in
80858223 the
80871076 table
80883929 has
80896782 a
80909635 unique
80922488 hash
80935341 value
80948194 Sets
80961047 Besides
80973900 recovering
80986753 the
80999606 entry
81012459 that
81025312 has
81038165 a
81051018 given
81063871 key
81076724 many
81089577 hash
81102430 table
81115283 implementations
81128136 can
81140989 also
81153842 tell
81166695 whether
81179548 such
81192401 an
81205254 entry
81218107 exists
81230960 or
81243813 not
81256666 Those
81269519 structures
81282372 can
81295225 therefore
81308078 be
81320931 used
81333784 to
81346637 implement
81359490 a
81372343 set
81385196 data
81398049 structure
81410902 which
81423755 merely
81436608 records
81449461 whether
81462314 a
81475167 given
81488020 key
81500873 belongs
81513726 to
81526579 a
81539432 specified
81552285 set
81565138 of
81577991 keys
81590844 In
81603697 this
81616550 case
81629403 the
81642256 structure
81655109 can
81667962 be
81680815 simplified
81693668 by
81706521 eliminating
81719374 all
81732227 parts
81745080 that
81757933 have
81770786 to
81783639 do
81796492 with
81809345 the
81822198 entry
81835051 values
81847904 Hashing
81860757 can
81873610 be
81886463 used
81899316 to
81912169 implement
81925022 both
81937875 static
81950728 and
81963581 dynamic
81976434 sets
81989287 Object
82002140 representation
82014993 Several
82027846 dynamic
82040699 languages
82053552 such
82066405 as
82079258 Perl
82092111 Python
82104964 JavaScript
82117817 and
82130670 Ruby
82143523 use
82156376 hash
82169229 tables
82182082 to
82194935 implement
82207788 objects
82220641 In
82233494 this
82246347 representation
82259200 the
82272053 keys
82284906 are
82297759 the
82310612 names
82323465 of
82336318 the
82349171 members
82362024 and
82374877 methods
82387730 of
82400583 the
82413436 object
82426289 and
82439142 the
82451995 values
82464848 are
82477701 pointers
82490554 to
82503407 the
82516260 corresponding
82529113 member
82541966 or
82554819 method
82567672 Unique
82580525 data
82593378 representation
82606231 Hash
82619084 tables
82631937 can
82644790 be
82657643 used
82670496 by
82683349 some
82696202 programs
82709055 to
82721908 avoid
82734761 creating
82747614 multiple
82760467 character
82773320 strings
82786173 with
82799026 the
82811879 same
82824732 contents
82837585 For
82850438 that
82863291 purpose
82876144 all
82888997 strings
82901850 in
82914703 use
82927556 by
82940409 the
82953262 program
82966115 are
82978968 stored
82991821 in
83004674 a
83017527 single
83030380 string
83043233 pool
83056086 implemented
83068939 as
83081792 a
83094645 hash
83107498 table
83120351 which
83133204 is
83146057 checked
83158910 whenever
83171763 a
83184616 new
83197469 string
83210322 has
83223175 to
83236028 be
83248881 created
83261734 This
83274587 technique
83287440 was
83300293 introduced
83313146 in
83325999 Lisp
83338852 interpreters
83351705 under
83364558 the
83377411 name
83390264 hash
83403117 consing
83415970 and
83428823 can
83441676 be
83454529 used
83467382 with
83480235 many
83493088 other
83505941 kinds
83518794 of
83531647 data
83544500 expression
83557353 trees
83570206 in
83583059 a
83595912 symbolic
83608765 algebra
83621618 system
83634471 records
83647324 in
83660177 a
83673030 database
83685883 files
83698736 in
83711589 a
83724442 file
83737295 system
83750148 binary
83763001 decision
83775854 diagrams
83788707 etc
83801560 String
83814413 interning
83827266 Main
83840119 article
83852972 String
83865825 interning
83878678 Implementations
83891531 In
83904384 programming
83917237 languages
83930090 Many
83942943 programming
83955796 languages
83968649 provide
83981502 hash
83994355 table
84007208 functionality
84020061 either
84032914 as
84045767 built
84058620 in
84071473 associative
84084326 arrays
84097179 or
84110032 as
84122885 standard
84135738 library
84148591 modules
84161444 In
84174297 C
84187150 11
84200003 for
84212856 example
84225709 the
84238562 unordered
84251415 map
84264268 class
84277121 provides
84289974 hash
84302827 tables
84315680 for
84328533 keys
84341386 and
84354239 values
84367092 of
84379945 arbitrary
84392798 type
84405651 In
84418504 PHP
84431357 5
84444210 the
84457063 Zend
84469916 2
84482769 engine
84495622 uses
84508475 one
84521328 of
84534181 the
84547034 hash
84559887 functions
84572740 from
84585593 Daniel
84598446 J
84611299 Bernstein
84624152 to
84637005 generate
84649858 the
84662711 hash
84675564 values
84688417 used
84701270 in
84714123 managing
84726976 the
84739829 mappings
84752682 of
84765535 data
84778388 pointers
84791241 stored
84804094 in
84816947 a
84829800 hash
84842653 table
84855506 In
84868359 the
84881212 PHP
84894065 source
84906918 code
84919771 it
84932624 is
84945477 labelled
84958330 as
84971183 DJBX33A
84984036 Daniel
84996889 J
85009742 Bernstein
85022595 Times
85035448 33
85048301 with
85061154 Addition
85074007 Pythons
85086860 built
85099713 in
85112566 hash
85125419 table
85138272 implementation
85151125 in
85163978 the
85176831 form
85189684 of
85202537 the
85215390 dict
85228243 type
85241096 as
85253949 well
85266802 as
85279655 Perls
85292508 hash
85305361 type
85318214 are
85331067 used
85343920 internally
85356773 to
85369626 implement
85382479 namespaces
85395332 and
85408185 therefore
85421038 need
85433891 to
85446744 pay
85459597 more
85472450 attention
85485303 to
85498156 security
85511009 ie
85523862 collision
85536715 attacks
85549568 In
85562421 the
85575274 NET
85588127 Framework
85600980 support
85613833 for
85626686 hash
85639539 tables
85652392 is
85665245 provided
85678098 via
85690951 the
85703804 non
85716657 generic
85729510 Hashtable
85742363 and
85755216 generic
85768069 Dictionary
85780922 classes
85793775 which
85806628 store
85819481 key
85832334 value
85845187 pairs
85858040 and
85870893 the
85883746 generic
85896599 HashSet
85909452 class
85922305 which
85935158 stores
85948011 only
85960864 values
85973717 Independent
85986570 packages
85999423 SparseHash
86012276 formerly
86025129 Google
86037982 SparseHash
86050835 An
86063688 extremely
86076541 memory
86089394 efficient
86102247 hash
86115100 map
86127953 implementation
86140806 with
86153659 only
86166512 2
86179365 bits
86192218 entry
86205071 of
86217924 overhead
86230777 The
86243630 SparseHash
86256483 library
86269336 has
86282189 several
86295042 C
86307895 hash
86320748 map
86333601 implementations
86346454 with
86359307 different
86372160 performance
86385013 characteristics
86397866 including
86410719 one
86423572 that
86436425 optimizes
86449278 for
86462131 memory
86474984 use
86487837 and
86500690 another
86513543 that
86526396 optimizes
86539249 for
86552102 speed
86564955 Sunrise
86577808 DD
86590661 An
86603514 open
86616367 source
86629220 C
86642073 library
86654926 for
86667779 hash
86680632 table
86693485 storage
86706338 of
86719191 arbitrary
86732044 data
86744897 objects
86757750 with
86770603 lock
86783456 free
86796309 lookups
86809162 built
86822015 in
86834868 reference
86847721 counting
86860574 and
86873427 guaranteed
86886280 order
86899133 iteration
86911986 The
86924839 library
86937692 can
86950545 participate
86963398 in
86976251 external
86989104 reference
87001957 counting
87014810 systems
87027663 or
87040516 use
87053369 its
87066222 own
87079075 built
87091928 in
87104781 reference
87117634 counting
87130487 It
87143340 comes
87156193 with
87169046 a
87181899 variety
87194752 of
87207605 hash
87220458 functions
87233311 and
87246164 allows
87259017 the
87271870 use
87284723 of
87297576 runtime
87310429 supplied
87323282 hash
87336135 functions
87348988 via
87361841 callback
87374694 mechanism
87387547 Source
87400400 code
87413253 is
87426106 well
87438959 documented
87451812 uthash
87464665 This
87477518 is
87490371 an
87503224 easy
87516077 to
87528930 use
87541783 hash
87554636 table
87567489 for
87580342 C
87593195 structures
87606048 History
87618901 The
87631754 idea
87644607 of
87657460 hashing
87670313 arose
87683166 independently
87696019 in
87708872 different
87721725 places
87734578 In
87747431 January
87760284 1953
87773137 H
87785990 P
87798843 Luhn
87811696 wrote
87824549 an
87837402 internal
87850255 IBM
87863108 memorandum
87875961 that
87888814 used
87901667 hashing
87914520 with
87927373 chaining24
87940226 G
87953079 N
87965932 Amdahl
87978785 E
87991638 M
88004491 Boehme
88017344 N
88030197 Rochester
88043050 and
88055903 Arthur
88068756 Samuel
88081609 implemented
88094462 a
88107315 program
88120168 using
88133021 hashing
88145874 at
88158727 about
88171580 the
88184433 same
88197286 time
88210139 Open
88222992 addressing
88235845 with
88248698 linear
88261551 probing
88274404 relatively
88287257 prime
88300110 stepping
88312963 is
88325816 cr
88338669 ed
88351522 to
88364375 Amdahl
88377228 but
88390081 Ershov
88402934 in
88415787 Russia
88428640 had
88441493 the
88454346 same
88467199 idea24
88480052 See
88492905 also
88505758 Rabin
88518611 Karp
88531464 string
88544317 search
88557170 algorithm
88570023 Stable
88582876 hashing
88595729 Consistent
88608582 hashing
88621435 Extendible
88634288 hashing
88647141 Lazy
88659994 deletion
88672847 Pearson
88685700 hashing
88698553 Related
88711406 data
88724259 structures
88737112 There
88749965 are
88762818 several
88775671 data
88788524 structures
88801377 that
88814230 use
88827083 hash
88839936 functions
88852789 but
88865642 cannot
88878495 be
88891348 considered
88904201 special
88917054 cases
88929907 of
88942760 hash
88955613 tables
88968466 Bloom
88981319 filter
88994172 memory
89007025 efficient
89019878 data
89032731 structure
89045584 designed
89058437 for
89071290 constant
89084143 time
89096996 approximate
89109849 lookups
89122702 uses
89135555 hash
89148408 functions
89161261 and
89174114 can
89186967 be
89199820 seen
89212673 as
89225526 an
89238379 approximate
89251232 hash
89264085 table
89276938 Distributed
89289791 hash
89302644 table
89315497 DHT
89328350 a
89341203 resilient
89354056 dynamic
89366909 table
89379762 spread
89392615 over
89405468 several
89418321 nodes
89431174 of
89444027 a
89456880 network
89469733 Hash
89482586 array
89495439 mapped
89508292 trie
89521145 a
89533998 trie
89546851 structure
89559704 similar
89572557 to
89585410 the
89598263 array
89611116 mapped
89623969 trie
89636822 but
89649675 where
89662528 each
89675381 key
89688234 is
89701087 hashed
89713940 first
89726793 A
89739646 red
89752499 black
89765352 tree
89778205 is
89791058 a
89803911 data
89816764 structure
89829617 which
89842470 is
89855323 a
89868176 type
89881029 of
89893882 self
89906735 balancing
89919588 binary
89932441 search
89945294 tree
89958147 Balance
89971000 is
89983853 preserved
89996706 by
90009559 painting
90022412 each
90035265 node
90048118 of
90060971 the
90073824 tree
90086677 with
90099530 one
90112383 of
90125236 two
90138089 colors
90150942 typically
90163795 called
90176648 red
90189501 and
90202354 black
90215207 in
90228060 a
90240913 way
90253766 that
90266619 satisfies
90279472 certain
90292325 properties
90305178 which
90318031 collectively
90330884 constrain
90343737 how
90356590 unbalanced
90369443 the
90382296 tree
90395149 can
90408002 become
90420855 in
90433708 the
90446561 worst
90459414 case
90472267 When
90485120 the
90497973 tree
90510826 is
90523679 modified
90536532 the
90549385 new
90562238 tree
90575091 is
90587944 subsequently
90600797 rearranged
90613650 and
90626503 repainted
90639356 to
90652209 restore
90665062 the
90677915 coloring
90690768 properties
90703621 The
90716474 properties
90729327 are
90742180 designed
90755033 in
90767886 such
90780739 a
90793592 way
90806445 that
90819298 this
90832151 rearranging
90845004 and
90857857 recoloring
90870710 can
90883563 be
90896416 performed
90909269 efficiently
90922122 The
90934975 balancing
90947828 of
90960681 the
90973534 tree
90986387 is
90999240 not
91012093 perfect
91024946 but
91037799 it
91050652 is
91063505 good
91076358 enough
91089211 to
91102064 allow
91114917 it
91127770 to
91140623 guarantee
91153476 searching
91166329 in
91179182 O
91192035 log
91204888 n
91217741 time
91230594 where
91243447 n
91256300 is
91269153 the
91282006 total
91294859 number
91307712 of
91320565 elements
91333418 in
91346271 the
91359124 tree
91371977 The
91384830 insertion
91397683 and
91410536 deletion
91423389 operations
91436242 along
91449095 with
91461948 the
91474801 tree
91487654 rearrangement
91500507 and
91513360 recoloring
91526213 are
91539066 also
91551919 performed
91564772 in
91577625 O
91590478 log
91603331 n
91616184 time
91629037 1
91641890 Tracking
91654743 the
91667596 color
91680449 of
91693302 each
91706155 node
91719008 requires
91731861 only
91744714 1
91757567 bit
91770420 of
91783273 information
91796126 per
91808979 node
91821832 because
91834685 there
91847538 are
91860391 only
91873244 two
91886097 colors
91898950 The
91911803 tree
91924656 does
91937509 not
91950362 contain
91963215 any
91976068 other
91988921 data
92001774 specific
92014627 to
92027480 its
92040333 being
92053186 a
92066039 red
92078892 black
92091745 tree
92104598 so
92117451 its
92130304 memory
92143157 footprint
92156010 is
92168863 almost
92181716 identical
92194569 to
92207422 a
92220275 classic
92233128 uncolored
92245981 binary
92258834 search
92271687 tree
92284540 In
92297393 many
92310246 cases
92323099 the
92335952 additional
92348805 bit
92361658 of
92374511 information
92387364 can
92400217 be
92413070 stored
92425923 at
92438776 no
92451629 additional
92464482 memory
92477335 cost
92490188 The
92503041 original
92515894 data
92528747 structure
92541600 was
92554453 invented
92567306 in
92580159 1972
92593012 by
92605865 Rudolf
92618718 Bayer
92631571 2
92644424 and
92657277 named
92670130 symmetric
92682983 binary
92695836 B
92708689 tree
92721542 but
92734395 acquired
92747248 its
92760101 modern
92772954 name
92785807 in
92798660 a
92811513 paper
92824366 in
92837219 1978
92850072 by
92862925 Leonidas
92875778 J
92888631 Guibas
92901484 and
92914337 Robert
92927190 Sedgewick
92940043 entitled
92952896 A
92965749 Dichromatic
92978602 Framework
92991455 for
93004308 Balanced
93017161 Trees
93030014 3
93042867 The
93055720 color
93068573 red
93081426 was
93094279 chosen
93107132 because
93119985 it
93132838 was
93145691 the
93158544 best
93171397 looking
93184250 color
93197103 produced
93209956 by
93222809 the
93235662 color
93248515 laser
93261368 printer
93274221 available
93287074 to
93299927 the
93312780 authors
93325633 while
93338486 working
93351339 at
93364192 Xerox
93377045 PARC
93389898 4
93402751 Terminology
93415604 A
93428457 red
93441310 black
93454163 tree
93467016 is
93479869 a
93492722 special
93505575 type
93518428 of
93531281 binary
93544134 tree
93556987 used
93569840 in
93582693 computer
93595546 science
93608399 to
93621252 organize
93634105 pieces
93646958 of
93659811 comparable
93672664 data
93685517 such
93698370 as
93711223 text
93724076 fragments
93736929 or
93749782 numbers
93762635 The
93775488 leaf
93788341 nodes
93801194 of
93814047 red
93826900 black
93839753 trees
93852606 do
93865459 not
93878312 contain
93891165 data
93904018 These
93916871 leaves
93929724 need
93942577 not
93955430 be
93968283 explicit
93981136 in
93993989 computer
94006842 memory—a
94019695 null
94032548 child
94045401 pointer
94058254 can
94071107 encode
94083960 the
94096813 fact
94109666 that
94122519 this
94135372 child
94148225 is
94161078 a
94173931 leaf—but
94186784 it
94199637 simplifies
94212490 some
94225343 algorithms
94238196 for
94251049 operating
94263902 on
94276755 red
94289608 black
94302461 trees
94315314 if
94328167 the
94341020 leaves
94353873 really
94366726 are
94379579 explicit
94392432 nodes
94405285 To
94418138 save
94430991 memory
94443844 sometimes
94456697 a
94469550 single
94482403 sentinel
94495256 node
94508109 performs
94520962 the
94533815 role
94546668 of
94559521 all
94572374 leaf
94585227 nodes
94598080 all
94610933 references
94623786 from
94636639 internal
94649492 nodes
94662345 to
94675198 leaf
94688051 nodes
94700904 then
94713757 point
94726610 to
94739463 the
94752316 sentinel
94765169 node
94778022 Red
94790875 black
94803728 trees
94816581 like
94829434 all
94842287 binary
94855140 search
94867993 trees
94880846 allow
94893699 efficient
94906552 in
94919405 order
94932258 traversal
94945111 that
94957964 is
94970817 in
94983670 the
94996523 order
95009376 Left
95022229 Root
95035082 Right
95047935 of
95060788 their
95073641 elements
95086494 The
95099347 search
95112200 time
95125053 results
95137906 from
95150759 the
95163612 traversal
95176465 from
95189318 root
95202171 to
95215024 leaf
95227877 and
95240730 therefore
95253583 a
95266436 balanced
95279289 tree
95292142 of
95304995 n
95317848 nodes
95330701 having
95343554 the
95356407 least
95369260 possible
95382113 tree
95394966 height
95407819 results
95420672 in
95433525 O
95446378 log
95459231 n
95472084 search
95484937 time
95497790 Properties
95510643 Diagram
95523496 of
95536349 binary
95549202 tree
95562055 The
95574908 black
95587761 root
95600614 node
95613467 has
95626320 two
95639173 red
95652026 children
95664879 and
95677732 four
95690585 black
95703438 grandchildren
95716291 The
95729144 child
95741997 nodes
95754850 of
95767703 the
95780556 grandchildren
95793409 are
95806262 black
95819115 nil
95831968 pointers
95844821 or
95857674 red
95870527 nodes
95883380 with
95896233 black
95909086 nil
95921939 pointers
95934792 An
95947645 example
95960498 of
95973351 a
95986204 red
95999057 black
96011910 tree
96024763 In
96037616 addition
96050469 to
96063322 the
96076175 requirements
96089028 imposed
96101881 on
96114734 a
96127587 binary
96140440 search
96153293 tree
96166146 the
96178999 following
96191852 must
96204705 be
96217558 satisfied
96230411 by
96243264 a
96256117 red
96268970 black
96281823 tree
96294676 5
96307529 A
96320382 node
96333235 is
96346088 either
96358941 red
96371794 or
96384647 black
96397500 The
96410353 root
96423206 is
96436059 black
96448912 This
96461765 rule
96474618 is
96487471 sometimes
96500324 omitted
96513177 Since
96526030 the
96538883 root
96551736 can
96564589 always
96577442 be
96590295 changed
96603148 from
96616001 red
96628854 to
96641707 black
96654560 but
96667413 not
96680266 necessarily
96693119 vice
96705972 versa
96718825 this
96731678 rule
96744531 has
96757384 little
96770237 effect
96783090 on
96795943 analysis
96808796 All
96821649 leaves
96834502 NIL
96847355 are
96860208 black
96873061 All
96885914 leaves
96898767 are
96911620 same
96924473 color
96937326 as
96950179 the
96963032 root
96975885 Every
96988738 red
97001591 node
97014444 must
97027297 have
97040150 two
97053003 black
97065856 child
97078709 nodes
97091562 Every
97104415 path
97117268 from
97130121 a
97142974 given
97155827 node
97168680 to
97181533 any
97194386 of
97207239 its
97220092 descendant
97232945 leaves
97245798 contains
97258651 the
97271504 same
97284357 number
97297210 of
97310063 black
97322916 nodes
97335769 These
97348622 constraints
97361475 enforce
97374328 a
97387181 critical
97400034 property
97412887 of
97425740 red
97438593 black
97451446 trees
97464299 that
97477152 the
97490005 path
97502858 from
97515711 the
97528564 root
97541417 to
97554270 the
97567123 furthest
97579976 leaf
97592829 is
97605682 no
97618535 more
97631388 than
97644241 twice
97657094 as
97669947 long
97682800 as
97695653 the
97708506 path
97721359 from
97734212 the
97747065 root
97759918 to
97772771 the
97785624 nearest
97798477 leaf
97811330 The
97824183 result
97837036 is
97849889 that
97862742 the
97875595 tree
97888448 is
97901301 roughly
97914154 height
97927007 balanced
97939860 Since
97952713 operations
97965566 such
97978419 as
97991272 inserting
98004125 deleting
98016978 and
98029831 finding
98042684 values
98055537 require
98068390 worst
98081243 case
98094096 time
98106949 proportional
98119802 to
98132655 the
98145508 height
98158361 of
98171214 the
98184067 tree
98196920 this
98209773 theoretical
98222626 upper
98235479 bound
98248332 on
98261185 the
98274038 height
98286891 allows
98299744 red
98312597 black
98325450 trees
98338303 to
98351156 be
98364009 efficient
98376862 in
98389715 the
98402568 worst
98415421 case
98428274 unlike
98441127 ordinary
98453980 binary
98466833 search
98479686 trees
98492539 To
98505392 see
98518245 why
98531098 this
98543951 is
98556804 guaranteed
98569657 it
98582510 suffices
98595363 to
98608216 consider
98621069 the
98633922 effect
98646775 of
98659628 properties
98672481 4
98685334 and
98698187 5
98711040 together
98723893 For
98736746 a
98749599 red
98762452 black
98775305 tree
98788158 T
98801011 let
98813864 B
98826717 be
98839570 the
98852423 number
98865276 of
98878129 black
98890982 nodes
98903835 in
98916688 property
98929541 5
98942394 Let
98955247 the
98968100 shortest
98980953 possible
98993806 path
99006659 from
99019512 the
99032365 root
99045218 of
99058071 T
99070924 to
99083777 any
99096630 leaf
99109483 consist
99122336 of
99135189 B
99148042 black
99160895 nodes
99173748 Longer
99186601 possible
99199454 paths
99212307 may
99225160 be
99238013 constructed
99250866 by
99263719 inserting
99276572 red
99289425 nodes
99302278 However
99315131 property
99327984 4
99340837 makes
99353690 it
99366543 impossible
99379396 to
99392249 insert
99405102 more
99417955 than
99430808 one
99443661 consecutive
99456514 red
99469367 node
99482220 Therefore
99495073 the
99507926 longest
99520779 possible
99533632 path
99546485 consists
99559338 of
99572191 2B
99585044 nodes
99597897 alternating
99610750 black
99623603 and
99636456 red
99649309 The
99662162 shortest
99675015 possible

110664330 structures
110677183 Red
110690036 black

110715742 offer
110728595 worst
110741448 case

110767154 for

111139891 building
111152744 blocks
111165597 in
111178450 other
111191303 data

111217009 which
111229862 provide
111242715 worst
111255568 case
111268421 guarantees
111281274 for
111294127 example
111306980 many
111319833 data
111332686 structures
111345539 used
111358392 in
111371245 computational
111384098 geometry
111396951 can
111409804 be
111422657 based
111435510 on
111448363 red
111461216 black
111474069 trees
111486922 and
111499775 the
111512628 Completely
111525481 Fair
111538334 Scheduler
111551187 used
111564040 in
111576893 current
111589746 Linux
111602599 kernels
111615452 uses
111628305 red
111641158 black
111654011 trees
111666864 The
111679717 AVL
111692570 tree
111705423 is
111718276 another
111731129 structure
111743982 supporting
111756835 O
111769688 log
111782541 n
111795394 search
111808247 insertion
111821100 and
111833953 removal
111846806 It
111859659 is
111872512 more
111885365 rigidly
111898218 balanced
111911071 than
111923924 red
111936777 black
111949630 trees
111962483 leading
111975336 to
111988189 slower
112001042 insertion
112013895 and
112026748 removal
112039601 but
112052454 faster
112065307 retrieval
112078160 This
112091013 makes
112103866 it
112116719 attractive
112129572 for
112142425 data
112155278 structures
112168131 that
112180984 may
112193837 be
112206690 built
112219543 once
112232396 and
112245249 loaded
112258102 without
112270955 reconstruction
112283808 such
112296661 as
112309514 language
112322367 dictionaries
112335220 or
112348073 program

112373779 such
112386632 as
112399485 the
112412338 opcodes
112425191 of
112438044 an
112450897 assembler
112463750 or
112476603 interpreter
112489456 Red
112502309 black
112515162 trees
112528015 are
112540868 also
112553721 particularly
112566574 valuable
112579427 in
112592280 functional
112605133 programming
112617986 where
112630839 they
112643692 are
112656545 one
112669398 of
112682251 the
112695104 most
112707957 common
112720810 persistent
112733663 data
112746516 structures
112759369 used
112772222 to
112785075 construct
112797928 associative
112810781 arrays
112823634 and
112836487 sets
112849340 which
112862193 can
112875046 retain
112887899 previous
112900752 versions
112913605 after
112926458 mutations
112939311 The
112952164 persistent
112965017 version
112977870 of
112990723 red
113003576 black
113016429 trees
113029282 requires
113042135 O
113054988 log
113067841 n
113080694 space
113093547 for
113106400 each
113119253 insertion
113132106 or
113144959 deletion
113157812 in
113170665 addition
113183518 to
113196371 time
113209224 For
113222077 every
113234930 2
113247783 4
113260636 tree
113273489 there
113286342 are
113299195 corresponding
113312048 red
113324901 black
113337754 trees
113350607 with
113363460 data
113376313 elements
113389166 in
113402019 the
113414872 same
113427725 order
113440578 The
113453431 insertion
113466284 and
113479137 deletion
113491990 operations
113504843 on
113517696 2
113530549 4
113543402 trees
113556255 are
113569108 also
113581961 equivalent
113594814 to
113607667 color
113620520 flipping
113633373 and
113646226 rotations
113659079 in
113671932 red
113684785 black
113697638 trees
113710491 This
113723344 makes
113736197 2
113749050 4
113761903 trees
113774756 an
113787609 important
113800462 tool
113813315 for
113826168 understanding
113839021 the
113851874 logic
113864727 behind
113877580 red
113890433 black
113903286 trees
113916139 and
113928992 this
113941845 is
113954698 why
113967551 many
113980404 introductory
113993257 algorithm
114006110 texts
114018963 introduce
114031816 2
114044669 4
114057522 trees
114070375 just
114083228 before
114096081 red
114108934 black
114121787 trees
114134640 even
114147493 though
114160346 2
114173199 4
114186052 trees
114198905 are
114211758 not
114224611 often
114237464 used
114250317 in
114263170 practice
114276023 In
114288876 2008
114301729 Sedgewick
114314582 introduced
114327435 a
114340288 simpler
114353141 version
114365994 of
114378847 the
114391700 red
114404553 black
114417406 tree
114430259 called
114443112 the
114455965 left
114468818 leaning
114481671 red
114494524 black
114507377 tree
114520230 6
114533083 by
114545936 eliminating
114558789 a
114571642 previously
114584495 unspecified
114597348 degree
114610201 of
114623054 freedom
114635907 in
114648760 the
114661613 implementation
114674466 The
114687319 LLRB
114700172 maintains
114713025 an
114725878 additional
114738731 invariant
114751584 that
114764437 all
114777290 red
114790143 links
114802996 must
114815849 lean
114828702 left
114841555 except
114854408 during
114867261 inserts
114880114 and
114892967 deletes
114905820 Red
114918673 black
114931526 trees
114944379 can
114957232 be
114970085 made
114982938 isometric
114995791 to
115008644 either
115021497 2
115034350 3
115047203 trees
115060056 7
115072909 or
115085762 2
115098615 4
115111468 trees
115124321 6
115137174 for
115150027 any
115162880 sequence
115175733 of
115188586 operations
115201439 The
115214292 2
115227145 4
115239998 tree
115252851 isometry
115265704 was
115278557 described
115291410 in
115304263 1978
115317116 by
115329969 Sedgewick
115342822 this
115355675 quote
115368528 needs
115381381 a
115394234 citation
115407087 With
115419940 2
115432793 4
115445646 trees
115458499 the
115471352 isometry
115484205 is
115497058 resolved
115509911 by
115522764 a
115535617 color
115548470 flip
115561323 corresponding
115574176 to
115587029 a
115599882 split
115612735 in
115625588 which
115638441 the
115651294 red
115664147 color
115677000 of
115689853 two
115702706 children
115715559 nodes
115728412 leaves
115741265 the
115754118 children
115766971 and
115779824 moves
115792677 to
115805530 the
115818383 parent
115831236 node
115844089 The
115856942 tango
115869795 tree
115882648 a
115895501 type
115908354 of
115921207 tree
115934060 optimized
115946913 for
115959766 fast
115972619 searches
115985472 usually
115998325 when
116011178 uses
116024031 red
116036884 black
116049737 trees
116062590 as
116075443 part
116088296 of
116101149 its
116114002 data
116126855 structure
116139708 Operations
116152561 Read
116165414 only
116178267 operations
116191120 on
116203973 a
116216826 red
116229679 black
116242532 tree
116255385 require
116268238 no
116281091 modification
116293944 from
116306797 those
116319650 used
116332503 for
116345356 binary
116358209 search
116371062 trees
116383915 because
116396768 every
116409621 red
116422474 black
116435327 tree
116448180 is
116461033 a
116473886 special
116486739 case
116499592 of
116512445 a
116525298 simple
116538151 binary
116551004 search
116563857 tree
116576710 However
116589563 the
116602416 immediate
116615269 result
116628122 of
116640975 an
116653828 insertion
116666681 or
116679534 removal
116692387 may
116705240 violate
116718093 the
116730946 properties
116743799 of
116756652 a
116769505 red
116782358 black
116795211 tree
116808064 Restoring
116820917 the
116833770 red
116846623 black
116859476 properties
116872329 requires
116885182 a
116898035 small
116910888 number
116923741 O
116936594 log
116949447 n
116962300 or
116975153 amortized
116988006 O
117000859 1
117013712 of
117026565 color
117039418 changes
117052271 which
117065124 are
117077977 very
117090830 quick
117103683 in
117116536 practice
117129389 and
117142242 no
117155095 more
117167948 than
117180801 three
117193654 tree
117206507 rotations
117219360 two
117232213 for
117245066 insertion
117257919 Although
117270772 insert
117283625 and
117296478 delete
117309331 operations
117322184 are
117335037 complicated
117347890 their
117360743 times
117373596 remain
117386449 O
117399302 log
117412155 n
117425008 Insertion
117437861 Insertion
117450714 begins
117463567 by
117476420 adding
117489273 the
117502126 node
117514979 as
117527832 any
117540685 binary
117553538 search
117566391 tree
117579244 insertion
117592097 does
117604950 and
117617803 by
117630656 coloring
117643509 it
117656362 red
117669215 Whereas
117682068 in
117694921 the
117707774 binary
117720627 search
117733480 tree
117746333 we
117759186 always
117772039 add
117784892 a
117797745 leaf
117810598 in
117823451 the
117836304 red
117849157 black
117862010 tree
117874863 leaves
117887716 contain
117900569 no
117913422 information
117926275 so
117939128 instead
117951981 we
117964834 add
117977687 a
117990540 red
118003393 interior
118016246 node
118029099 with
118041952 two
118054805 black
118067658 leaves
118080511 in
118093364 place
118106217 of
118119070 an
118131923 existing
118144776 black
118157629 leaf

118183335 happens

118221894 on
118234747 the
118247600 color
118260453 of
118273306 other
118286159 nearby

118414689 refer

118556072 human

118620337 property

120766788 color

120908171 or
120921024 implied

120985289 numbered
120998142 triangle
121010995 represents
121023848 a
121036701 subtree
121049554 of
121062407 unspecified
121075260 depth

121100966 black
121113819 circle
121126672 atop
121139525 the
121152378 triangle

121178084 a
121190937 black
121203790 root

121229496 otherwise

121255202 root

121293761 color

121319467 unspecified
121332320 Each
121345173 case
121358026 will
121370879 be
121383732 demonstrated

121409438 example
121422291 C
121435144 code

121460850 uncle
121473703 and
121486556 grandparent

121512262 can
121525115 be
121537968 found
121550821 by
121563674 these
121576527 functions
121589380 In
121602233 a
121615086 regular
121627939 binary
121640792 search
121653645 tree
121666498 when
121679351 deleting
121692204 a
121705057 node
121717910 with
121730763 two
121743616 non
121756469 leaf
121769322 children
121782175 we
121795028 find
121807881 either
121820734 the
121833587 maximum
121846440 element
121859293 in
121872146 its
121884999 left
121897852 subtree

121923558 is
121936411 the
121949264 in
121962117 order
121974970 predecessor
121987823 or
122000676 the
122013529 minimum
122026382 element

122103500 is
122116353 the

122193471 its
122206324 value
122219177 into
122232030 the
122244883 node
122257736 being
122270589 deleted
122283442 as
122296295 shown
122309148 here
122322001 We
122334854 then
122347707 delete
122360560 the
122373413 node
122386266 we
122399119 copied
122411972 the
122424825 value
122437678 from
122450531 which
122463384 must
122476237 have
122489090 fewer
122501943 than
122514796 two
122527649 non
122540502 leaf
122553355 children
122566208 Non
122579061 leaf
122591914 children
122604767 rather
122617620 than
122630473 all
122643326 children
122656179 are
122669032 specified
122681885 here
122694738 because
122707591 unlike

122861827 anywhere

122887533 that

123003210 children

123298829 like

123375947 regular

123478771 value
